xin Hindi x1 reflects Hindi language/culture/religion in aspect x2 ab 12 [defaults to not include Urdu; Indian (Bharat) nationality may be implied (when constrained by xingu'e)]; (cf. srito, xurdo, bengo)
xim ink x1 is a quantity of ink of color/pigment x2 used by writing device x3 ao 0 (cf. penbi)
xir xi'a horse x1 is a horse/equine/[colt/mare/stallion/pony] of species/breed x2 ai 29 [(adjective:) x1 is equine/equestrian]; (cf. sufti, xasli, kumte)
xil xi'u wheel x1 is a wheel [tool] of device/vehicle x2, made of materials/having properties x3 a 6 (cf. carce, karce, pulni, tutci)

xip Hispanic x1 reflects Hispano-American culture/nationalities in aspect x2 ab 2 [refers to Spanish-speaking Latin-American countries, not Brazil/Guyana]; (cf. merko, mexno, spano, ketco, bemro, gento)

xla bad 'mal-' x1 is bad for x2 by standard x3; x1 is poor/unacceptable to x2 2i 95 [be careful to distinguish between a bad/unacceptable event, and a bad/unacceptable agent: x1 does poorly (= lenu ko'a gasnu cu xlali and not normally ko'a xlali)]; (cf. palci, mabla, xamgu, betri)

xlu influence 'lure' x1 (agent) influences/lures/tempts x2 into action/state x3 by influence/threat/lure x4 7j 24 [also impresses; x4 is alluring (= trivelxlu for place reordering); x3 may be an achieved action/state, or an attempt to perform an action/enter a state)]; (x3 and x4 are normally events or states); (cf. djica, mukti, trina, jitro, sazri, tcica, xance, stidi, kajde, maksi)
xol xoi hotel x1 is a hotel/inn/hostel at location x2 operated by x3 7f 0 (cf. barja, gusta)
rab Arabic x1 reflects Arabic-speaking culture/nationality in aspect x2 ab 2 (cf. sadjo, semto, lubno, rakso, sirxo)
xai injure 'hurt' x1 (event) injures/harms/damages victim x2 in property x3 (ka) resulting in injury x4 (state) 4c 82 [also hurts]; (cf. cortu, daspo, spofu, katna, porpi)
xis xi'o Christian x1 pertains to the Christian religion/culture/nationality in aspect x2 ac 16 (cf. jegvo, lijda)
xub buckwheat 'rhubarb' x1 is a quantity of buckwheat/rhubarb/sorrel grass of species/strain x2 aj 3 (cf. spati)
xuk turkey x1 is a turkey [food/bird] of species/breed x2 ai 9 (cf. cipni)
rul flower x1 is a/the flower/blossom/bloom [body-part] of plant/species x2; (adjective:) x1 is floral aj 27 (cf. spati)

xru return x1 (agent) returns x2 to origin/earlier state x3 from x4; x1 moves/gives x2 back to x3 from x4 7f 49 [x2 goes back/reverts/[retreats] to x3 (= se'ixru for agent self-returning to a previous location/situation: renumber places in the lujvo); (x3 may be a location or a person or an event/situation; the latter may also be expressed with krefu or rapli and a causative like rinka/rikygau)]; (cf. benji, krefu, rapli, rinka)
xum xu'i chemical x1 is an instance of substance/chemical/drug x2 (individual or mass) with purity x3 ah 2 (cf. curve, cidro, marna, nimre)
xun xu'e red x1 is red/crimson/ruddy [color adjective] 1a 86 (cf. skari, blabi, xekri, kandi, carmi, nukni, narju, rozgu, zirpu)
xur xu'o Urdu x1 reflects Urdu language/culture/nationality in aspect x2 ab 1 (cf. kisto, srito, xindo)

xus xu'a assert x1 (agent) asserts/claims/declares x2 (du'u) is true [can be used for epistemology of authority] 3j 91 [also: x1 states/says that/affirms/purports to know that x2]; (cf. natfe which is propositional and non-agentive, nupre)
xul smooth x1 is smooth/even/[soft/silky] in texture/regularity 6f 4 (cf. plita, rufsu, tengu, dikni, pinta, sakli, spali)
zaz state abstract abstractor: state (event) abstractor; x1 is continuous state of [bridi] being true - (cf. zasni, zasti, tcini)
za'o superfective interval event contour: continuing too long after natural end of ...; superfective | ---->at 0 (cf. dukse)
zan za'a favorable x1 is a favorable connotation/sense/way-of-looking-at x2 used by x3 3d 46 (cf. funca, mabla, xamgu, vrude)
zaj gymnast x1 is a gymnast at/performs gymnastics feat x2 a 0 (cf. sluji, dansu)
zal grind 'pulverize' x1 [individual or mass of hard surfaces] grinds/pulverizes/crushes x2 into powder x3 a 1 [may need mosra tanru]; (cf. daspo, purmo, marxa, pulce, canre, molki)
zar zau approve x1 approves of/gives favor to plan/action x2 (object/event) 8d 62 (cf. cmavo list zau, natfe)

zac zai market 'mart' x1 is a market/store/exchange/shop(s) selling/trading (for) x2, operated by/with participants x3 3m 290 [also: mall, marketplace, shopping center, cooperative, bazaar, trading post, mart; the concept is the function of selling/exchanging coupled with a location, and is more oriented to the larger concept of marketplace than the stalls/shops that comprise it, though it does not exclude the latter individual shops (= zaisle); x3 may include both owners/proprietors and customers in some markets, but in most contexts refers only to the operators]; (cf. vecnu, canja, dinju, banxa)
zag za'u buttock 'arse' x1 is a/the buttock(s)/arse/rear/seat [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: rounded surface, support] aa 0 [also ass, behind, butt]; (cf. ganxo, mabla)

zas temporary 'transient' x1 is temporary/not permanent/expected to change in property x2 (ka) by standard/expectant x3 7j 6 [also transient]; (cf. vitno, stodi, cenba, galfi, binxo, stika, stali, tcini, vitke)
zat za'i exist x1 exists/is real/actual/reality for x2 under metaphysics x3 3j 104 [words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place]; [x1 is physical (one sense)]; (cf. fatci, xanri)
bab soap x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of soap from source x2 of composition including x3 ah 5 (cf. lumci, fonmo)
bay x1 is a bay in/of coast/shoreline x2 6c 6 (cf. lalxu, xamsi)
zba make x1 makes/assembles/builds/manufactures/creates x2 out of materials/parts/components x3 7f 217 [should not be used to express causation]; (cf. cupra, larcu, rutni, finti, gundi)
zbe pedestal 'base' x1 is a pedestal/base/stand/pallet supporting x2 (object/event), of materials/properties x3 a 1 [pallet (= lafyzbe)]; (cf. jamfu, jicmu, jubme, tuple, ckana, cpana, loldi, sanli)
zda nest 'den' x1 is a nest/house/lair/den/[home] of/for x2 4d 280 [home (= tercnizda), house (constructed building) (= zdadi'u)]; (cf. dinju, ginka, kumfa, se xabju)

zdi amusing 'amused' x1 (abstract) is amusing/entertaining to x2 in property/aspect x3; x3 is what amuses x2 about x1 5g 79 [also: x1 occupies x2 pleasantly; x1 is fun for x2; x2 is amused by x1; x2 has fun (at) doing x1; x1 is an amusement/entertainment/[game] for x2]; (cf. cinri, panka, xajmi for 'funny', kelci)
zel 7 digit/number: 7 (digit) 3a 0
ze'e whole time interval time tense interval: the whole of time (rafsi is used to represent any time interval) at 0
zev ze'o outward location tense relation/direction; beyond/outward/receding from ... at 0

zer zei crime x1 (event/state) is a punishable crime/[taboo/sin] to people/culture/judges/jury x2 8d 24 [taboo (= kluzei, cacyzei); sin (= madzei, jdamadzei); heresy (= jdazei)]; (cf. flalu, sfasa, zungi, palci, lijda, pajni, javni, tcaci, marde, pulji, tinbe)
zen ze'a increase 'augment' x1 (experiencer) increases/is incremented/augmented in property/quantity x2 by amount x3 a 35 (cf. jdika, zmadu, banro, jmina)

zep 1E-21 'zepto' x1 is 1x10**-21 of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units) ae 0 (cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zetro)

zet 1E21 'zetta' x1 is 1x10**21 of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units) ae 0 (cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zepti)

zga observe x1 observes/[notices]/watches/beholds x2 using senses/means x3 under conditions x4 6m 189 [behold/watch/gaze (= vi'azga); guard/watchman/sentinel (= zgaku'i, jdeku'i)]; (cf. cmavo list ga'a, ganse, viska, catlu, tirna, pencu, sumne, kurji, canci, catlu, jarco, lanli, pinka, simlu)

zgi gi'e music x1 is music performed/produced by x2 (event) 5g 55 [x2 event may be person playing instrument, singing, musical source operating/vibrating, etc.; instrument (= zgica'a); play an instrument (= zgica'apli, zgiterca'a, selzgigau, selzgizu'e); song (= sagzgi, selsa'a); voice, as used musically (= zgivo'a); composed music (= finzgi)]; (cf. damri, dansu, flani, janbe, jgita, pipno, rilti, tabra, tonga, xagri, siclu)
zil nonexistent it pro-sumti: fills a sumti place, deleting it from selbri place structure;changes selbri semantics

zif zi'e free x1 is free/at liberty to do/be x2 (event/state) under conditions x3 8e 21 [also unrestricted, unfettered, unconstrained; (adjective:) independent; (adverb:) willingly, voluntarily, freely, may, optionally; (potential:) x1 voluntarily does x2]; (cf. pinfu, rinju, bilga, curmi, kakne, frili)
zin zi'i zinc x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of zinc (Zn); [metaphor: hard metal] ag 2 (cf. jinme)
zir zi'u purple x1 is purple/violet [color adjective] 1a 6 (cf. skari, blabi, xekri, kandi, carmi, nukni, blanu, xunre)

ziv vle invest x1 (agent) invests resources x2 in investment x3 expecting return/profit x4 (object(s)/event) 8d 4 [also ties up/[risks/gambles]; x1 is an investor; x2 are invested assets of x1; bond (= jertervle)]; (cf. prali, canja, jbera, dejni, ponse)
zma mau more x1 exceeds/is more than x2 in property/quantity x3 (ka/ni) by amount/excess x4 6k 248 [also positive (= nonmau)]; (cf. cmavo list mau, mleca, zenba, jmina, bancu, dukse, traji)
zmi automatic x1 is automatic in function x2 under conditions x3 7g 1 (cf. macnu)
zon zo'a tangential to location tense relation/direction; tangential to/passing by ... at 0 (cf. pencu, tanjo)
zor zo'i inward location tense relation/direction; nearer than .../inward/approaching from ... at 0 (cf. nenri, setca)
zum activity abstract abstractor: activity (event) abstractor; x1 is abstract activity of [bridi] composed of x2 - (cf. zukte)

zuk zu'e act x1 is a volitional entity employing means/taking action x2 for purpose/goal x3/to end x3 2e 148 [also acting at, undertaking, doing; agentive cause with volition/purpose; also x3 objective, end]; (cf. cmavo list zu'e, bapli, gunka, jalge, krinu, mukti, rinka, snuti, gasnu, fasnu, minji, prenu, ciksi, jibri, pilno, pluta, tadji, tutci)
zmu maize x1 is a quantity of maize/corn [grain] of species/strain x2 aj 8 (cf. gurni)
zug guilt x1 feels guilt/remorse about x2 (abstraction) 9d 1 (cf. cmavo list .u'u, cinmo, xenru, zekri)
zul left x1 is to the left/left-hand side of x2 which faces/in-frame-of-reference x3 1e 38 [also x3 is the standard of orientation for x2]; (cf. cmavo list zu'a, pritu, mlana, crane, trixe, farna)

zun zu'i interfere 'hinder' x1 (evt./state) interferes with/hinders/disrupts x2 (evt./state/process) due to quality x3 (ka) a 39 [also blocks, obstructs, baffles; not necessarily forcing cessation] (cf. fanta, dicra, fliba, fanza, raktu, klina, bandu, cfipu, ganlo)
zut tse sit x1 sits [assumes sitting position] on surface x2 1g 178 (cf. stizu, cpana, vreta)

zva at x1 (object/event) is at/attending/present at x2 (event/location) 4d 184 [refers to a nonce location for an object/activity that is mobile]; (cf. especially stuzi for an inherent/inalienable location, jbini, nenri, se vasru, cpana, diklo, jibni, cabna, lamji, tcini, xabju, jmive, jundi, vitke)
A sumti or logical connective: sumti afterthought or
UI1 attentive attitudinal: attentive - inattentive - avoiding (cf. jundi, rivbi)
UI*1 inattentive attitudinal: attentive - inattentive - avoiding
UI*1 avoiding attitudinal: attentive - inattentive - avoiding
UI1 alertness attitudinal: alertness - exhaustion (cf. sanji, cikna, tatpi)
UI*1 exhaustion attitudinal: alertness - exhaustion
UI1 effort attitudinal: effort - no special effort - repose (cf. gunka, slunandu, guksurla, troci, selprogunka)
UI*1 no special effort attitudinal: effort - no special effort - repose
UI*1 repose attitudinal: effort - no special effort - repose
UI1 hope attitudinal: hope - despair (cf. pacna)
UI*1 despair attitudinal: hope - despair
UI1 interest attitudinal: interest - disinterest - repulsion (cf. cinri, selcni)
UI*1 disinterest attitudinal: interest - disinterest - repulsion
UI*1 repulsion attitudinal: interest - disinterest - repulsion
BY* a letteral for a
UI1 intent attitudinal: intent - indecision - rejection/refusal (cf. termu'i, terzu'e, seljdi, selcu'a)
UI*1 indecision attitudinal: intent - indecision - rejection/refusal
UI*1 refusal attitudinal: intent - indecision - rejection/refusal
UI1 desire attitudinal: desire - indifference - reluctance (cf. djica)
UI*1 indifference attitudinal: desire - indifference - reluctance
UI*1 reluctance attitudinal: desire - indifference - reluctance
PU after time tense relation/direction: will [selbri]; after [sumti]; default future tense
UI2 I anticipate evidential: I expect - I experience - I remember (cf. bavykri, lifri, morji)
UI*2 I experience evidential: I expect - I experience - I remember
UI*2 I remember evidential: I expect - I experience - I remember
BAhE emphasize next forethought emphasis indicator; indicates next word is especially emphasized
BAI replaced by basti modal, 1st place replaced by ...
ZAhO perfective interval event contour: in the aftermath of ...; since ...; perfective | |----
UI3 exaggeration discursive: exaggeration - accuracy - understatement (cf. satci, dukse)
UI*3 accuracy discursive: exaggeration - accuracy - understatement
UI*3 understatement discursive: exaggeration - accuracy - understatement
PU* will be going to time tense: will be going to; (tense/modal)
PU* will actually time tense: future actuality; modal aspect
ZAhO* will be then time tense: will be then; (tense/modal)
BAI compelled by bapli modal, 1st place (forced by) forcedly; compelled by force ...
PU* will have been time tense: will have been; (tense/modal)
BAI in language bangu modal, 1st place in language ...
BE link sumti sumti link to attach sumti (default x2) to a selbri; used in descriptions
FAhA1 north of location tense relation/direction; north of
COI request to send vocative: request to send/speak
BAI sent by benji modal, 1st place (sender) sent by ...
BEhO end linked sumti elidable terminator: end linked sumti in specified description
UI5 lack attitudinal modifier: lack/need - presence/satisfaction - satiation (cf. claxu, nitcu, mansa)
UI*5 presence attitudinal modifier: lack/need - presence/satisfaction - satiation
UI*5 satiation attitudinal modifier: lack/need - presence/satisfaction - satiation
BEI link more sumti separates multiple linked sumti within a selbri; used in descriptions
PA1 8 digit/number: 8 (digit) [eight]
BIhE hi priority operator prefixed to a mex operator to indicate high priority
BIhI unordered interval non-logical interval connective: unordered between ... and ...
BIhI ordered interval non-logical interval connective: ordered from ... to ...
UI3a new information discursive: newly introduced information - previously introduced information (cf. nindatni, saurdatni)
UI*3 old information discursive: newly introduced information - previously introduced information
PA* 8,000 number/quantity: 8,000 expressed with comma
MOI* is a octet quantifier selbri: convert 8 to cardinal selbri; x1 is a set with the octet of members x2
MOI* is eighth among quantified selbri: convert 8 to ordinal selbri; x1 is eighth among x2 ordered by rule x3
PA* 80 number/quantity: 80 [eighty]
PA* 800 number/quantity: 800 [eight hundred]
PA* 8004 number/quantity: 8004, without comma
BO short scope link short scope joiner; joins various constructs with shortest scope and right grouping
BOI end number or lerfu elidable terminator: terminate numeral or letteral string
BU word to lerfu convert any single word to BY
GOhA some selbri 1 logically quantified predicate variable: some selbri 1
GOhA some selbri 2 logically quantified predicate variable: some selbri 2
GOhA some selbri 3 logically quantified predicate variable: some selbri 3
UI7 start emotion attitudinal contour: start emotion - continue emotion - end emotion
UI*7 continue emotion attitudinal contour: start emotion - continue emotion - end emotion
UI*7 end emotion attitudinal contour: start emotion - continue emotion - end emotion
FAhA3 coincident with location tense relation/direction; coincident with/at the same place as; space equivalent of ca
BY2 b letteral for b
PU during time tense relation/direction: is [selbri]; during/simultaneous with [sumti]; present tense
ma PU* when? sumti question asking for a time/date/event; simultaneous with what?
CAhA actually is modal aspect: actuality/ongoing event
UI2 I define evidential: I define (cf. mitcu'a, mitsmu)
BAI by authority of catni modal, 1st place by authority of ...
ZAhO continuative interval event contour: during ...; continuative |-----|
FAhA2 in front of location tense relation/direction; forwards/to the front of ...
ZAhO* has been time tense: has been, is now in the aftermath of; (tense/modal)
PU* currently is time tense: present actuality; modal aspect
ZAhO* is now time tense: is now/simultaneously, is now in the middle of; (tense/modal)
CAI intense emotion attitudinal: strong intensity attitude modifier
PU* during and after time tense: during and after; (tense/modal)
ZAhO* is going to time tense: is going to, is now just about to, is now anticipating; (tense/modal)
BAI lacked by claxu modal, 1st place lacked by ...
JOI in a set with non-logical connective: set link, unordered; "and also", but forming a set
LAU font shift 2-word letteral/shift: the word following indicates a new font (e.g. italics, manuscript)
CEhE afterthought termset links terms into an afterthought termset
PA3 percent digit/number: % percentage symbol, hundredths
JOI in a sequence with non-logical connective: ordered sequence link; "and then", forming a sequence
KOhA8 lambda pseudo-quantifier binding a variable within an abstraction that represents an open place
CEI pro-bridi assign selbri variable assignment; assigns broda series pro-bridi to a selbri
PA1 3 digit/number: 3 (digit) [three]
BAI in system ciste modal, 1st place used in scalar negation in system/context ...
PA5 infinity digit/number: infinity; followed by digits =>aleph cardinality
ROI* infinite times tense interval modifier: occurs infinite times, eternally; objective tense; defaults as time
BAI emotionally felt by cinmo modal, 1st place emotionally felt by ...
BAI on the scale ckilu modal, 1st place on the scale ...
PA* 3,000 number/quantity: 3,000 expressed with comma
MOI* is a trio quantifier selbri: convert 3 to cardinal selbri; x1 is a set with the trio of members x2
MOI* is third among quantified selbri: convert 3 to ordinal selbri; x1 is third among x2 ordered by rule x3
PA* 30 number/quantity: 30 [thirty]
PA* 300 number/quantity: 300 [three hundred]
ROI* thrice tense interval modifier: thrice; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense
CO tanru inversion tanru inversion operator; "... of type ..."; allows modifier trailing sumti without sumti links
ZAhO initiative interval event contour: at the starting point of ...; initiative <|> |
GOhA unspecif bridi elliptical/unspecified bridi relationship
ZAhO achievative interval event contour: at the instantaneous point of ...; achievative; point event <|>
COI partings vocative: partings/good-bye
ZAhO cessative interval event contour: at the ending point of ... even if not done; cessative | >< |
COI greetings vocative: greetings/hello
COI* greetings in passing vocative: greetings in passing
CU selbri separator elidable marker: separates selbri from preceding sumti, allows preceding terminator elision
VUhU3 absolute value unary mathematical operator: absolute value/norm |a|
CUhE modal ? tense/modal question
CAI neutral emotion attitudinal: neutral scalar attitude modifier
MOI probability selbri convert number to probability selbri; event x1 has probability (n) of occurring under cond. x2
BAI as said by cusku modal, 1st place (attribution/quotation) as said by source ...; used for quotation
ko'a BAI* as said by it-1 tagged sumti: can be used for embedded: it-1 said, "...", with editorial unquote and insert
BY2 c letteral for c
KOhA1 something 1 logically quantified existential pro-sumti: there exists something 1 (usually restricted)
PA4 all except digit/number: all except n; all but n; default 1
MOI* is penultimate among quantified selbri: converts all-but-(1) to ordinal selbri; x1 is penultimate among x2 by rule x3
MOI* is antepenultimate quantified selbri: converts all-but-2 to ordinal selbri; x1 is antepenult. among x2 by rule x3
KOhA2 eventual utterance pro-sumti: remote future utterance; "He'll tell you tomorrow. IT will be a doozy."
UI3 supposing discursive: supposing - in fact (cf. sruma)
UI*3 in fact discursive: supposing - in fact
DAhO cancel pro-assigns discursive: cancel pro-sumti/pro-bridi assignments
KOhA2 earlier utterance pro-sumti: a remote past utterance; "She couldn't have known that IT would be true."
UI5 empathy attitudinal modifier: marks empathetic use of preceding attitudinal; shows another's feelings (cf. cnijmi)
PA2 hex digit A digit/number: hex digit A (decimal 10) [ten]
KOhA1 something 2 logically quantified existential pro-sumti: there exists something 2 (usually restricted)
ZAhO pausative event contour for a temporary halt and ensuing pause in a process
KOhA2 soon utterance pro-sumti: a near future utterance
BAI dated detri modal, 1st place (for letters) dated ... ; attaches date stamp
VUhU3 logarithm binary mathematical operator: logarithm; [log/ln a to base b]; default base 10 or e
KOhA2 recent utterance pro-sumti: a recent utterance
KOhA2 this utterance pro-sumti: this utterance
bu BY* pause symbol letteral: Lojban "." character
KOhA1 something 3 logically quantified existential pro-sumti: there exists something 3 (usually restricted)
ZAhO resumptitive event contour for resumption of a paused process

barna+morna: pattern of marks: x1 = morna1 (pattern), x2 = morna2 (patterned) = barna1 (mark), x3 = morna3 (arrangement), x4 = barna2 (marked)
banro+zukte: to grow something: x1 = zukte1 (act), x2 = banro1 (grow), x3 = banro2 (grown), x4 = banro3 (grown from)
banro+stuzi: nursery; growth/colony of germs: x1 = stuzi1 (site), x2 = banro1 (grow), x3 = banro2 (grown), x4 = banro3 (grown from)
bacru+dunku: to bitch/whine about something: x1 = dunku1 (anguished) = bacru1 (speaker), x2 = dunku2 (distressing), x3 = bacru2 (utterance)

bacru+notci: spoken message; to tell someone something: x1 = notci1 (message) = bacru2 (utterance), x2 = notci2 (message subject ), x3 = notci3 (send message) = bacru1 (speaker), x4 = notci4 (receive message)
bacru+tadji: pronunciation: x1 = tadji1 (method), x2 = bacru1 (speaker), x3 = bacru2 (utterance), x4 = tadji3 (method conditions)
bacru+cusku: to say something: x1 = cusku1 (speaker) = bacru1 (speaker), x2 = cusku2 (said), x3 = cusku3 (addressed), x4 = cusku4 (expression medium ) = bacru2 (utterance)
bancu+catlu: look through: x1 = catlu1 (looker) = bancu3 (reference for beyond), x2 = bancu2 (bound beyond which)

bajra+jivna: to run a race: x1 = bajra1 (runner) = jivna1 (compete), x2 = jivna2 (rival), x3 = jivna3 (contest), x4 = jivna4 (prize), x5 = bajra2 (running surface), x6 = bajra3 (running limbs), x7 = bajra4 (running gait)

bajra+klama: to come running: x1 = bajra1 (runner) = klama1 (come), x2 = klama2 (destination), x3 = klama3 (starting point), x4 = klama4 (route of going), x5 = bajra2 (running surface), x6 = bajra3 (running limbs), x7 = bajra4 (running gait)

bajra+cliva: run away from: x1 = bajra1 (runner) = cliva1 (leave), x2 = cliva2 (left behind), x3 = cliva3 (route of leaving), x4 = bajra2 (running surface), x5 = bajra3 (running limbs), x6 = bajra4 (running gait)
bajra+stuzi: running track: x1 = stuzi1 (site)
bakni+cange: cattle ranch: x1 = cange1 (farm), x2 = cange2 (farm location ), x3 = cange3 (farmer), x4 = cange4 (farm produce) = bakni2 (bovine species/breed)
bakni+catra: bull-fighter: x1 = catra1 (kill), x2 = catra3 (killing method )
bakni+plixa: plougher, someone using oxen to plough: x1 = plixa1 (plow), x2 = plixa2 (plowed), x3 = plixa3 (plowing tool) (omit, x4 = plixa4 (pull plow) = bakni1 (bovine))
bakni+rectu: beef, steak, beefsteak: x1 = rectu1 (meat)
bakri+tanbo: chalkboard/slate: x1 = tanbo1 (board), x2 = tanbo2 (board material)
bakni+janbe: cowbell: x1 = janbe1 (ring), x2 = janbe2 (chime)
bakni+kakpa: using oxen to dig, plough: x1 = kakpa1 (dig), x2 = kakpa2 (dug out), x3 = kakpa3 (dug from)
banli+ckule: University: x1 = ckule1 (school), x2 = ckule2 (school location ), x3 = ckule3 (curriculum), x4 = ckule4 (attend school), x5 = ckule5 (operate school), x6 = banli3 (greatness standard)

banli+dakfu+xarci: great sword: x1 = xarci1 (weapon) = dakfu1 (knife) = banli1 (great), x2 = xarci2 (threatened by weapon), x3 = xarci3 (use weapon), x4 = dakfu3 (knife material), x5 = banli2 (greatness property), x6 = banli3 (greatness standard)
banli+jamna: great war: x1 = jamna1 (war), x2 = jamna2 (enemy [in war]), x3 = jamna3 (in contention), x4 = banli3 (greatness standard)
banli+kumfa: Hall: x1 = kumfa1 (room) = banli1 (great), x2 = kumfa2 (structure with room), x3 = kumfa3 (room boundary), x4 = banli2 (greatness property), x5 = banli3 (greatness standard)
banli+nu+jamna: great war: x1 = nu1 ( event abstract), x2 = jamna1 (war), x3 = jamna2 (enemy [in war]), x4 = jamna3 (in contention), x5 = banli3 (greatness standard)
banli+traji: grandmaster; generally, greatest: x1 = banli1 (great) = traji1 (superlative), x2 = traji4 (range limited by extreme), x3 = banli2 (greatness property), x4 = banli3 (greatness standard)
banli+sonci: warrior, great soldier: x1 = banli1 (great) = sonci1 (soldier), x2 = sonci2 (soldier's army), x3 = banli3 (greatness standard)
banli+tutra: realm: x1 = tutra1 (territory), x2 = tutra2 (controls territory), x3 = banli2 (greatness property), x4 = banli3 (greatness standard)

bancu+bangu: metalanguage: x1 = bangu1 (language) = bancu1 (something beyond), x2 = bangu2 (language community), x3 = bangu3, x4 = bancu3 (reference for beyond), x5 = bancu4 (beyondness property) (the prefix {bancu} may be used to translate meta-, but doesn't seem the best way of doing so)

bancu+cripu: bridge to the beyond (poetic coining): x1 = cripu1 (bridge) = bancu2 (bound beyond which), x2 = cripu2 (bridged over), x3 = cripu3 (1st side of bridge) = bancu1 (something beyond), x4 = cripu4 (2nd side of bridge) = bancu3 (reference for beyond)

bancu+ckule: college: x1 = ckule1 (school), x2 = ckule2 (school location ), x3 = ckule3 (curriculum), x4 = ckule4 (attend school), x5 = ckule5 (operate school), x6 = bancu2 (bound beyond which) [More useful to have bancu2 (bound beyond which), e.g. Matriculation, than bancu3 (reference for beyond), e.g. Senior High School]
bancu+ke+se+renro+kruvi: hyperbola: x1 = kruvi1 (curve), x2 = kruvi2 (curved), x3 = kruvi3 (curve locus ), x4 = kruvi4 (define curve)

bancu+klama: go beyond: x1 = klama1 (come), x2 = bancu2 (bound beyond which), x3 = klama3 (starting point), x4 = klama4 (route of going), x5 = klama5 (transportation means ) (bancu2 (bound beyond which) may get blurred with bancu3 (reference for beyond) here)
bangu+jikca+saske: sociolinguistics: x1 = saske1 (science), x2 = saske3 (science methodology)
bangu+pilno: to speak a language: x1 = pilno1 (use), x2 = pilno2 (used) = bangu1 (language), x3 = pilno3 (use purpose ) = bangu3
bangu+pilno+saske: pragmatics: x1 = saske1 (science), x2 = saske3 (science methodology)
bangu+tavla: to speak a language. (Can also use baupli or tavla fo...): x1 = tavla1 (talk), x2 = tavla4 (talk language) = bangu1 (language), x3 = tavla2 (talked to), x4 = tavla3 (talk subject)
bangu+tadni: linguistics/linguist: x1 = tadni1 (study), x2 = tadni2 (studied)
bangu+ve+cusku: to be in language x: [Y is in language X - (xy banvelsku .ybu)]
bapli+pleji: to bribe: x1 = pleji1 (payor), x2 = pleji2 (payment), x3 = pleji3 (payee), x4 = pleji4 (paid for) = bapli2 (forced)
bartu+catke: to thrust: x1 = catke1 (shove), x2 = bartu2 (has outside), x3 = catke3 (shoved at)
barda+bloti: ship, big ship: x1 = bloti1 (boat) = barda1 (big), x2 = bloti2 (carried by boat), x3 = bloti3 (propel boat), x4 = barda3 (bigness standard)
bartu+flecu: to flow out of: x1 = flecu1 (flow), x2 = flecu2 (has flow), x3 = flecu4 (flow source ) = bartu2 (has outside) (omit, x4 = flecu3 (flow destination ) = bartu1 (something external))
bargu+cecla: bow: x1 = cecla1 (launcher) = bargu1 (arch), x2 = cecla2 (projectile), x3 = cecla3 (propellant), x4 = bargu3 (arch material)
bargu+xrani: bow: x1 = xrani1 (injure) = bargu1 (arch), x2 = xrani2 (injured), x3 = xrani3 (injury property), x4 = bargu3 (arch material)
barja+jatna: bar/cafe manager: x1 = jatna1 (captain), x2 = jatna2 (captained) = barja1 (bar)
bartu+kalri: to have an opening to the outside: x1 = kalri1 (open) = bartu2 (has outside), x2 = bartu1 (something external)

bartu+klama: to exit: x1 = klama1 (come), x2 = klama3 (starting point) = bartu2 (has outside), x3 = klama4 (route of going), x4 = klama5 (transportation means ) (omit, x5 = klama2 (destination) = bartu1 (something external))
bartu+cliva: to exit; (place structure of cliva): x1 = cliva1 (leave), x2 = cliva2 (left behind) = bartu2 (has outside), x3 = cliva3 (route of leaving)
bartu+tcadu: suburb: x1 = tcadu1 (city), x2 = tcadu3 (polity with city) [ x3 = tcadu3 (polity with city) is the main city]
bartu+te+zgana: exteroperceptors: x1 = zgana3 (observing sense), x2 = zgana2 (observed) = bartu1 (something external), x3 = zgana1 (observe) = bartu2 (has outside), x4 = zgana4 (observing conditions)
basti+cmene: pseudonym: x1 = cmene1 (name) = basti1 (substitute), x2 = cmene2 (named), x3 = cmene3 (namer)
basti+gasnu: to replace Y with Z: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = basti1 (substitute), x3 = basti2 (replaced), x4 = basti3 (replacement condition)
basti+valsi: anaphora: x1 = valsi1 (word) = basti1 (substitute), x2 = valsi3 (word language ), x3 = basti2 (replaced), x4 = basti3 (replacement condition)
batci+fendi: to bite something apart: x1 = batci1 (biter) = fendi1 (divide), x2 = batci2 (bitten) = fendi2 (partitioned), x3 = fendi3 (division), x4 = batci3 (bite locus)
batke+ciska: to type: x1 = ciska1 (writer), x2 = ciska2 (written), x3 = ciska3 (written on), x4 = ciska4 (writing implement) [ x5 = ciska4 (writing implement) is the keyboard]
batke+kevna: key hole: x1 = kevna1 (cavity), x2 = kevna2 (has cavity)
bangu+jicmu: language basis; (e.g. Esperanto's _Fundamento_): x1 = jicmu1 (basis), x2 = bangu1 (language)
bangu+certu: linguist (informally - more appropriate for: ) polyglot
bangu+saske: linguistics: x1 = saske1 (science), x2 = saske3 (science methodology)

balvi+lamji: next: x1 = balvi1 (future) = lamji1 (adjacent), x2 = balvi2 (before) = lamji2 (has adjacent), x3 = lamji3 (adjacency property) ( x4 = lamji3 (adjacency property) is sequence, not property)

balvi+lamji+djedi: tomorrow, the next day, the day after: x1 = djedi1 (full day) = balvi1 (future), x2 = lamji2 (has adjacent) = balvi2 (before), x3 = djedi3 (full day standard) (very much the standard lujvo for this concept)
balvi+lamji+jeftu: next week, the week after: x1 = jeftu1 (lasts [in weeks]) = balvi1 (future) = lamji1 (adjacent), x2 = lamji2 (has adjacent) = balvi2 (before), x3 = jeftu3 (week standard)
balvi+nanca+krefu+masti: anniversary month: x1 = masti1 (month), x2 = balvi2 (before), x3 = krefu3 (number of recurrence), x4 = masti3 (month standard)

balvi+nanca+krefu+djedi: anniversary day: x1 = djedi1 (full day), x2 = balvi2 (before), x3 = krefu3 (number of recurrence), x4 = djedi3 (full day standard) (today is the 30th anniverary of the birth of rock'n'roll@ le cabdei cu ~ lenu co'a zgikrnrokenrole kei li cino; also just na'anrefydje)
balvi+speni: fiance; fiancee: x1 = speni1 (married), x2 = speni2 (married to), x3 = speni3
balvi+temci+krefu: anniversary: x1 = krefu1 (recurrence), x2 = temci1 (time interval), x3 = balvi2 (before), x4 = krefu3 (number of recurrence) [includes place for Nth anniversary]
balvi+temci+krefu+masti: anniversary month: x1 = masti1 (month), x2 = temci1 (time interval), x3 = balvi2 (before), x4 = krefu3 (number of recurrence), x5 = masti3 (month standard)

balvi+temci+krefu+temci: anniversary: x1 = temci1 (time interval)(1) = krefu1 (recurrence), x2 = temci2 (start time)(1), x3 = temci3 (end time)(1), x4 = temci1 (time interval)(2), x5 = balvi2 (before), x6 = krefu3 (number of recurrence)
bersa+speni: daughter-in-law: x1 = speni1 (married), x2 = bersa2 (parent [of son]), x3 = speni3 (omit, x4 = speni2 (married to) = bersa1 (son))
betfu+cortu: bellyache: x1 = cortu1 (pain)
bebna+gleki: giddy: x1 = bebna1 (foolish) = gleki1 (happy), x2 = gleki2 (object of happiness)
betfu+kevna: abdominal cavity: x1 = kevna1 (cavity), x2 = betfu2 (has abdomen)
betfu+sefta+kevna: navel: x1 = kevna1 (cavity), x2 = kevna2 (has cavity) = betfu2 (has abdomen)
betfu+dasri: belt: x1 = dasri1 (ribbon), x2 = dasri2 (ribbon material)
betfu+cadzu: crawl: x1 = cadzu1 (walker), x2 = cadzu2 (walked on)
bevri+prenu: carrier; waiter; porter (etc.): x1 = bevri1 (carry) = prenu1 (person), x2 = bevri2 (carrier)

benji+mulno: to successfully deliver to, to have something get there: x1 = benji1 (transfer), x2 = benji2 (transferred), x3 = benji3 (receiver), x4 = benji4 (transmitter), x5 = benji5 (medium), x6 = mulno2 (completion property), x7 = mulno3 (completion standard)
bemro+joi+ketco: the Americas: x1 = bemro1 (North American) = ketco1 (South American), x2 = bemro2 (North American aspect) = ketco2 (South American aspect)
besna+morsi: brain-dead: x1 = morsi1 (dead)
berti+zmadu: something to the North of you: x1 = berti1 (north) = zmadu1 (more), x2 = berti2 (has to north) = zmadu2 (exceeded), x3 = berti3 (frame for north), x4 = zmadu4 (moreness margin)
berti+pagbu: northern part of something (e.g. territory): x1 = berti1 (north) = pagbu1 (part), x2 = pagbu2 (part of)
berti+stici: northwest: x1 = berti1 (north) = stici1 (west), x2 = berti2 (has to north) = stici2 (has to the west), x3 = berti3 (frame for north) = stici3 (frame for west)
berti+stuna: northeast: x1 = berti1 (north) = stuna1 (east), x2 = berti2 (has to north) = stuna2 (has to the east), x3 = berti3 (frame for north) = stuna3 (frame for east)
bersa+mamta: mother of son [as opposed to daughter] X: x1 = mamta1 (mother) = bersa2 (parent [of son]), x2 = mamta2 (mothered) = bersa1 (son)
bevri+marce: loaded vehicle; e.g. truck: x1 = marce1 (vehicle) = bevri1 (carry), x2 = marce2 (cargo) = bevri2 (carrier), x3 = marce3 (medium for vehicle), x4 = marce4 (vehicle propulsion)
bevri+carce: wagon, cart: x1 = carce1 (cart) = bevri1 (carry), x2 = carce2 (carried on cart) = bevri2 (carrier), x3 = carce3 (propel cart)
brife+claxu: still [of day]: x1 = claxu1 (alone)
brife+kluza: fluttering, loose to the wind: x1 = kluza1 (loose), x2 = kluza2 (has loose covering), x3 = kluza3 (looseness locus )
brife+molki: windmill: x1 = molki1 (mill), x2 = molki2 (mill process)
brife+vlile+carvi: windstorm: x1 = carvi1 (rain), x2 = carvi2 (rained on), x3 = carvi3 (rained from), x4 = brife2 (wind direction), x5 = brife3 (wind speed)
bilga+gasnu: to obligate someone to do something: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = bilga1 (obliged), x3 = bilga2 (obligation), x4 = bilga3 (obligation standard)
briju+jubme: desk: x1 = jubme1 (table), x2 = jubme2 (table material), x3 = jubme3 (leg), x4 = briju2 (office worker)
briju+kumfa: [Main] Office: x1 = kumfa1 (room) = briju1 (office), x2 = kumfa2 (structure with room) = briju3 (branch [of an office]), x3 = briju2 (office worker)
briju+tanxe: briefcase: x1 = tanxe1 (box), x2 = tanxe2 (box contents), x3 = tanxe3 (box material)
bikla+damri: whip [musical instrument]: x1 = damri1 (drum), x2 = damri2 (drumstick)
bikla+klama: to dash, to rush: x1 = klama1 (come), x2 = klama2 (destination), x3 = klama3 (starting point), x4 = klama4 (route of going), x5 = klama5 (transportation means )
bilma+binxo: to get sick: x1 = binxo1 (become) = bilma1 (ill), x2 = bilma2 (symptoms), x3 = bilma3 (illness)
bilma+simlu: sickly, sick-looking: x1 = simlu1 (seem) = bilma1 (ill), x2 = bilma2 (symptoms), x3 = bilma3 (illness), x4 = simlu3 (apparently observe), x5 = simlu4 (seeming conditions)
bitmu+pixra: wall picture [mural or framed painting]: x1 = pixra1 (picture), x2 = pixra2 (depicted), x3 = pixra3 (draw picture), x4 = pixra4 (picture medium) = bitmu1 (wall)

jbini+ke+ganse+steci: intersubjectivity: x1 = steci1 (specific) = jbini1 (between), x2 = ganse2 (sensed), x3 = ganse3 (sense employed), x4 = steci2 (special subset) = ganse1 (perceive), x5 = steci3 (set with specific) = jbini2 (have in between), x6 = jbini3 (betweenness property)
binra+jdima: insurance premium: x1 = jdima1 (price), x2 = jdima2 (priced at) = binra3 (covered condition), x3 = jdima3 (purchaser) = binra2 (insured), x4 = jdima4 (set price) = binra1 (insurer)

binra+vecnu: to sell insurance: x1 = vecnu1 (sell) = binra1 (insurer), x2 = binra2 (insured) = vecnu3 (buyer), x3 = binra3 (covered condition), x4 = vecnu4 (sale cost) [Company x1 sells insurance against x3 to x2 for x4]

ve+binra+vecnu: insurance premium: x1 = vecnu4 (sale cost), x2 = binra2 (insured) = vecnu3 (buyer), x3 = binra3 (covered condition), x4 = vecnu1 (sell) = binra1 (insurer) [x1 is the insurance premium for insurance against x3 to x2 sold by company x4]
jbini+na'e+voksa+se+bacru: buffer sound [interconsonantal]: x1 = bacru2 (utterance)
birka+cidni: elbow: x1 = cidni1 (knee), x2 = birka2 (armed)
birka+dandu+klama: to brachiate: x1 = klama1 (come) = birka2 (armed) = dandu1 (hang), x2 = klama2 (destination), x3 = klama3 (starting point), x4 = klama4 (route of going), x5 = dandu2 (hung from)
birka+jgari: hug, embrace: x1 = jgari1 (grasp) = birka2 (armed), x2 = jgari2 (grasped), x3 = jgari4 (place grasped) (omit, x4 = jgari3 (grasping appendage) = birka1 (arm))
birka+taxfu+pagbu: sleeve: x1 = pagbu1 (part), x2 = taxfu2 (wears garment) = birka2 (armed), x3 = taxfu3 (garment purpose)
birka+tubnu: sleeve: x1 = tubnu1 (tube), x2 = tubnu2 (tube material), x3 = birka2 (armed) ( x4 = birka2 (armed) is the se taxfu)
birka+tubnu+claxu: sleeveless: x1 = claxu1 (alone)
birka+vraga+jivna: arm-wrestling: x1 = jivna1 (compete), x2 = jivna2 (rival), x3 = jivna4 (prize)
bisli+cmalu+plini: comet: x1 = plini1 (planet) = bisli1 (ice), x2 = plini2 (planet primary), x3 = plini3 (planetary property), x4 = plini4 (planet orbit), x5 = bisli2 (ice composition)
bi+jetnu+kantu: byte, octet: x1 = kantu1 (quantum) = b
blanu+crino: blue-green: x1 = blanu1 (blue) = crino1 (green)
bliku+tanbo: a slab: x1 = bliku1 (block) = tanbo1 (board), x2 = bliku2 (block material) = tanbo2 (board material)

bloti+klama: to go by boat: x1 = klama1 (come), x2 = klama2 (destination), x3 = klama3 (starting point), x4 = klama4 (route of going), x5 = klama5 (transportation means ) = bloti1 (boat)
bloti+litru: to travel by boat: x1 = litru1 (travel), x2 = litru2 (route traveled), x3 = litru3 (travel means ) = bloti1 (boat)
bloti+muvdu+grana: oar: x1 = grana1 (rod), x2 = grana2 (rod material), x3 = bloti1 (boat)
bloti+sazri: boat pilot: x1 = sazri1 (operate), x2 = sazri2 (operated) = bloti1 (boat)

ciblu+se+pilka: bloody: x1 = pilka2 (has crust), x2 = pilka1 (crust) = ciblu1 (blood)
boxfo+snipa: sticky patch, sticky foil in general: x1 = snipa1 (sticky) = boxfo1 (sheet), x2 = snipa2 (stuck), x3 = boxfo2 (sheet material)
bongu+greku: skeleton: x1 = greku1 (frame), x2 = bongu2 (bone function )
bongu+kamju: spine, emphasizing shape/columnar aspect: x1 = kamju1 (column), x2 = bongu2 (bone function )
bolci+dinju: dome: x1 = dinju1 (building), x2 = dinju2 (building purpose )
bolci+grana+xarci: mace: x1 = xarci1 (weapon), x2 = xarci2 (threatened by weapon), x3 = xarci3 (use weapon), x4 = grana2 (rod material), x5 = bolci2 (ball material)
bolci+girzu+jivna: ball game tournament (generic): x1 = girzu1 (group) = jivna1 (compete) & jivna2 (rival), x2 = jivna4 (prize) ( x3 = jivna3 (contest) is the ball game)
bolci+gunro: in tanru for bowling: x1 = gunro1 (roll)
bolci+jemna: pearl; any ball-shaped gem: x1 = jemna1 (gem) = bolci1 (ball), x2 = jemna2 (jewel type ), x3 = jemna3 (jewel source ) = bolci2 (ball material)
bolci+kelci: ball game (generic): x1 = kelci1 (play), x2 = kelci2 (plaything) = bolci1 (ball)
bolci+kelci+jivna: to compete at a ball game: x1 = jivna1 (compete) = kelci1 (play), x2 = jivna2 (rival) = kelci1 (play), x3 = jivna4 (prize)
bolci+tikpa: to kick a football: x1 = tikpa1 (kick), x2 = tikpa2 (kicked) = bolci1 (ball), x3 = tikpa3 (kicked locus), x4 = tikpa4
bolci+tikpa+kelci: football [as game]: x1 = kelci1 (play)
bolci+tikpa+bolci: football ball: x1 = bolci1 (ball), x2 = bolci2 (ball material)
bolci+tikpa+jivna: football [as competition]: x1 = jivna1 (compete), x2 = jivna2 (rival), x3 = jivna4 (prize)
barda+binxo: to grow, to become big: x1 = barda1 (big), x2 = barda2 (bigness dimension), x3 = barda3 (bigness standard)
barda+barda: colossal: x1 = barda1 (big), x2 = barda2 (bigness dimension), x3 = barda3 (bigness standard)
barda+barda+crida: giant: x1 = crida1 (fairy), x2 = crida2 (fairy mythos)
barda+cutci: boot: x1 = cutci1 (shoe), x2 = cutci2 (shod), x3 = cutci3 (shoe material), x4 = barda3 (bigness standard)
barda+cadzu: to stride: x1 = cadzu1 (walker), x2 = cadzu2 (walked on), x3 = cadzu3 (walking limb), x4 = barda3 (bigness standard)
barda+fenra: abyss: x1 = barda1 (big) = fenra1 (crack), x2 = fenra2 (cracked), x3 = barda2 (bigness dimension), x4 = barda3 (bigness standard)
barda+jecta: megastate: x1 = jecta1 (polity) = barda1 (big), x2 = jecta2 (polity territory ), x3 = barda2 (bigness dimension), x4 = barda3 (bigness standard)
barda+jamfu+degji: big toe: x1 = barda1 (big) = jamfu1 (foot) = degji1 (finger), x2 = jamfu2 (has foot) = degji2 (limb with finger)
barda+jamfu+degji+calku: big toe nail: x1 = calku1 (shell), x2 = jamfu2 (has foot) = degji2 (limb with finger), x3 = calku3 (shell material)
barda+kruca: amply overlap: x1 = kruca1 (intersect), x2 = kruca2 (intersected), x3 = kruca3 (intersection locus), x4 = barda3 (bigness standard)

barda+zmadu: bigger: x1 = barda1 (big) = zmadu1 (more), x2 = zmadu2 (exceeded), x3 = barda2 (bigness dimension), x4 = zmadu4 (moreness margin) ( x5 = barda3 (bigness standard) elides out because compared bigness is not relative to a norm)
barda+patxu: big pot, cauldron: x1 = patxu1 (pot), x2 = patxu2 (pot contents ), x3 = patxu3 (pot material), x4 = barda3 (bigness standard)
barda+daplu: continent: x1 = barda1 (big) = daplu1 (island), x2 = daplu3 (contain island)
barda+rokci: boulder: x1 = barda1 (big) = rokci1 (rock), x2 = rokci2 (rock type ), x3 = rokci3 (rock location ), x4 = barda2 (bigness dimension), x5 = barda3 (bigness standard)
barda+salpo: steep: x1 = salpo1 (sloped), x2 = salpo2 (slope angle), x3 = salpo3 (slope horizon), x4 = barda3 (bigness standard)

bravau limna barda+vasru: swimming pool

xebro+malsi: synagogue: x1 = malsi1 (temple), x2 = malsi3 (temple location)
burcu+lumci: to sweep [of floor]: x1 = lumci1 (wash), x2 = lumci2 (washed) (omit, x3 = lumci3 (removed by washing) = burcu1 (brush))
bukpu+dinju: tent: x1 = dinju1 (building) = bukpu1 (cloth), x2 = dinju2 (building purpose ), x3 = bukpu2 (cloth material)
bukpu+cilta: thread: x1 = cilta1 (thread), x2 = cilta2 (thread material) = bukpu2 (cloth material)

bukpu+tarmi+te+jorne: "dart" of... joined to... [clothing]: x1 = jorne3 (joint), x2 = jorne2 (joined to) = bukpu1 (cloth), x3 = jorne1 (joined) = bukpu1 (cloth)
bukpu+te+jorne: seam of...; joined to ...: x1 = jorne3 (joint), x2 = jorne2 (joined to) = bukpu1 (cloth), x3 = jorne1 (joined) = bukpu1 (cloth)

bruna+speni: person married to one's brother; sister-in-law: x1 = speni1 (married), x2 = bruna2 (has brother), x3 = speni3 (omit, x4 = speni2 (married to) = bruna1 (brother))
bunre+nanba: brown bread: x1 = nanba1 (bread), x2 = nanba2 (grain in bread)
cabra+claxu: with no apparatus, unaided [e.g. bare-handed combats; with the naked eye]: x1 = claxu1 (alone), x2 = cabra2 (apparatus function )
catke+brife: the wind [as mover of sailed vehicles]: x1 = catke1 (shove) = brife1 (breeze), x2 = brife2 (wind direction), x3 = brife3 (wind speed), x4 = catke2 (shoved)
catke+slanu: valve, piston: x1 = slanu1 (cylinder) = catke3 (shoved at), x2 = slanu2 (cylinder material), x3 = catke2 (shoved)
catni+curmi: to permit: x1 = catni1 (authority [person]) = curmi1 (let), x2 = curmi2 (allowed), x3 = curmi3 (permission condition), x4 = catni3 (authority basis)
catni+ciska: to endorse: x1 = ciska1 (writer) = catni1 (authority [person]), x2 = ciska2 (written), x3 = ciska3 (written on), x4 = ciska4 (writing implement), x5 = catni2 (underling)
cabna+djedi: today: x1 = djedi1 (full day) = cabna1 (now), x2 = cabna2 (co-occurred with), x3 = djedi3 (full day standard)
cabna+masti: this month: x1 = masti1 (month), x2 = cabna2 (co-occurred with), x3 = masti3 (month standard)
cabna+mamta: current mother: x1 = mamta1 (mother), x2 = mamta2 (mothered), x3 = cabna2 (co-occurred with)
cabna+mintu: simultaneous with.../at time...: x1 = mintu1 (same), x2 = mintu2 (has as same), x3 = cabna2 (co-occurred with)
cabna+morna: current pattern of things: x1 = cabna1 (now) = morna1 (pattern), x2 = morna2 (patterned), x3 = morna3 (arrangement), x4 = cabna2 (co-occurred with)
cabna+na'e+zasti: extinct, not extant: x1 = zasti1 (exist), x2 = zasti2 (hold as existent), x3 = zasti3 (existence epistemology), x4 = cabna2 (co-occurred with)
cabna+nanca: this year: x1 = nanca1 (lasts [in years]), x2 = cabna2 (co-occurred with), x3 = nanca3 (year standard)
cabna+cedra: modern era [of history]: x1 = cedra1 (era)
cabna+sance: symphony (fig.), concord, harmony of sounds, simultaneous sound: x1 = sance1 (sound), x2 = sance2 (emit sound)
cabna+sinxa: signs for seasons and days [signs for specific times --- of daytime and nighttime]: x1 = sinxa1 (sign), x2 = sinxa2 (symbolized) = cabna2 (co-occurred with), x3 = sinxa3 (observe sign)
tcaci+djuno: have always known; familiar: x1 = djuno1 (know) = tcaci2 (acccustomed), x2 = djuno2 (known), x3 = djuno3 (subject known), x4 = djuno4 (epistemology), x5 = tcaci3 (custom conditions)
tcaci+javni: convention: x1 = javni1 (rule) = tcaci1 (custom), x2 = javni2 (prescribed by rule), x3 = javni3 (has rule) = tcaci1 (custom), x4 = tcaci3 (custom conditions)
cando+gasnu: to play [without a specific game; to play around]: x1 = gasnu1 (do) = cando1 (idle)
cando+kelci: to idly play with: x1 = kelci1 (play) = cando1 (idle), x2 = kelci2 (plaything)
cando+sisti: to cease and rest: x1 = cando1 (idle) = sisti1 (cease), x2 = sisti2 (stopped)

carmi+savru: roaring: x1 = savru1 (noise), x2 = savru2 (receive noise), x3 = savru3 (noise channel), x4 = carmi3 (find intense)

calku+curnu: snail: x1 = curnu1 (worm), x2 = curnu2 (worm species), x3 = curnu3

cmalu+catke: small pushes, pulses: x1 = catke1 (shove), x2 = catke2 (shoved), x3 = catke3 (shoved at), x4 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+cifnu: small infant [in size]: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = cifnu1 (infant), x2 = cifnu2 (infant species ), x3 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+cinfo: small lion (not primarily lion cub): x1 = cmalu1 (small) = cinfo1 (lion), x2 = cinfo2 (lion species), x3 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cinfo+panzi: lion cub:
cmalu+cipni: small bird: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = cipni1 (bird), x2 = cipni2 (bird species), x3 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+cmalu: tiny: x1 = cmalu1 (small), x2 = cmalu2 (smallness dimension), x3 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+cmila: to chuckle: x1 = cmila1 (laugh)
cmalu+crida: dwarf: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = crida1 (fairy), x2 = crida2 (fairy mythos)
cmalu+catlu+tutci: microscope: x1 = tutci1 (tool)
cmalu+daplu: little island: x1 = daplu1 (island) = cmalu1 (small), x2 = daplu2 (island material), x3 = daplu3 (contain island), x4 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+flecu: a trace [of mist]: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = flecu1 (flow), x2 = flecu2 (has flow), x3 = flecu3 (flow destination ), x4 = flecu4 (flow source ), x5 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)

cmalu+gugde: small country: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = gugde1 (country), x2 = gugde2 (countrymen), x3 = gugde3 (territory of country), x4 = cmalu2 (smallness dimension), x5 = cmalu3 (smallness standard) [countries can be small/minor in different ways, thence the, x6 = cmalu2 (smallness dimension)]
cmalu+gugde+turni: governor: x1 = turni1 (govern), x2 = turni2 (governed) = gugde1 (country) = cmalu1 (small)
cmalu+cladu+cabra: microphone: x1 = cabra1 (apparatus), x2 = cabra3 (apparatus operator)
cmalu+lalxu: small lake: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = lalxu1 (lake), x2 = lalxu2 (has lake), x3 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+cmana: hill: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = cmana1 (mountain), x2 = cmana2 (mountainous), x3 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+mudri+spisa: woodchip, splinter: x1 = spisa1 (piece) = cmalu1 (small), x2 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+pinta+flani: piccolo: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = flani1 (flute)

cmalu+plini: small planet, asteroid: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = plini1 (planet), x2 = plini2 (planet primary), x3 = plini3 (planetary property), x4 = plini4 (planet orbit), x5 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+rirxe: stream: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = rirxe1 (river), x2 = rirxe2 (landmass with river), x3 = rirxe3 (watershed), x4 = rirxe4 (mouth [of a river]), x5 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+rokci: gravel: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = rokci1 (rock), x2 = rokci2 (rock type ), x3 = rokci3 (rock location ), x4 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+liste: small list: x1 = liste1 (list) = cmalu1 (small), x2 = liste2 (set listed), x3 = liste3 (order [of a list]), x4 = liste4 (list medium ), x5 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+tarmi+sinxa: figurine [used in games]: x1 = sinxa1 (sign) = tarmi1 (shape) = cmalu1 (small), x2 = sinxa2 (symbolized) = tarmi2 (shaped), x3 = sinxa3 (observe sign)
cmalu+tcadu: village: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = tcadu1 (city), x2 = tcadu2 (city extent), x3 = tcadu3 (polity with city), x4 = tcadu4 (city hinterland ), x5 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+tricu: brush: x1 = tricu1 (tree) = cmalu1 (small), x2 = tricu2 (tree species), x3 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmalu+turni: small governor: (abbreviation of cmagu'etru)
cmalu+verba: small child [in size]: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = verba1 (child), x2 = verba2 (child's age), x3 = verba3 (child standard), x4 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)

cmalu+nixli: small girl: x1 = cmalu1 (small) = nixli1 (girl), x2 = nixli2 (girl's age), x3 = nixli3 (girlhood standard), x4 = cmalu3 (smallness standard) (should not be used for small as in infant), but rather [for size, with age implicit]
cmalu+zdani: small nest: x1 = zdani1 (nest) = cmalu1 (small), x2 = zdani2 (inhabit), x3 = cmalu3 (smallness standard)
cmene+basti: pronoun, pseudonym: x1 = basti1 (substitute), x2 = basti2 (replaced) = cmene2 (named), x3 = basti3 (replacement condition)
cmene+djuno: to know someone's name: (le djuno cu cmeju'o le cmene le se cmene). Used for "I know who" (more convenient than {kau} in some phrasings)
se+cmene+djuno: to know someone's name: Used for "I know who" (more convenient than {kau} in some phrasings)
cmene+kancu: to count out, naming the numbers: x1 = kancu1 (counter), x2 = kancu2 (set counted), x3 = kancu3 (number counted) = cmene1 (name), x4 = kancu4 (counting units)
cmene+morji: to remember someone's name: (cf. cmeju'o). Used for "I remember who"
cmene+sanji: to identify [be conscious of the name of]: x1 = sanji1 (conscious), x2 = cmene1 (name), x3 = cmene2 (named), x4 = cmene3 (namer)
cmene+tcita: nametag: x1 = tcita1 (label), x2 = tcita2 (labeled), x3 = tcita3 (label information) = cmene1 (name)

cmene+te+gerna: something that does the same job grammatically as a cmene name, even though it isn't a cmevla itself (e.g. la broda): x1 = gerna3 (grammatical) = cmene1 (name), x2 = gerna1 (grammar), x3 = gerna2 (grammar language )
cmene+valsi: morphologically-defined name [name word]: x1 = cmene1 (name) = valsi1 (word), x2 = cmene2 (named) = valsi2 (word meaning ), x3 = valsi3 (word language )
cmima+binxo: to join, to become a member of: x1 = binxo1 (become) = cmima1 (member), x2 = cmima2 (set of member), x3 = binxo3 (becoming conditions)
cmoni+bacru: to moan something: x1 = bacru1 (speaker) = cmoni1 (moans), x2 = bacru2 (utterance) = cmoni2 (moan), x3 = cmoni3 (expressed by moan)
cmoni+djica: to sigh for something: x1 = djica1 (desire) = cmoni1 (moans), x2 = djica2 (desired), x3 = djica3 (purpose desired for), x4 = cmoni2 (moan)
cmoni+cusku: to moan something: x1 = cmoni1 (moans) = cusku1 (speaker), x2 = cmoni2 (moan) = cusku2 (said), x3 = cusku3 (addressed)
canpa+dakfu: chisel: x1 = dakfu1 (knife) = canpa1 (shovel), x2 = canpa2 (dug with shovel) = dakfu2 (cut by knife), x3 = dakfu3 (knife material)
cnebo+korbi: neck edge [clothing]: x1 = korbi1 (edge), x2 = korbi2 (edged) (omit, x3 = korbi3 (bordering) = cnebo1 (neck))
cenba+datni: a variable: x1 = datni1 (data) = cenba1 (variable), x2 = datni2 (data subject ), x3 = datni3 (data collection)
cenba+klani: a variable: x1 = klani1 (quantity), x2 = klani2 (quantifier) = cenba2 (varying property), x3 = klani3 (scale of quantity) [ = domain]
cinmo+cortu: to hurt [emotionally]: x1 = cinmo1 (feels [emotion]), x2 = cinmo3 (object of emotion)
cnici+gasnu: to order, to sort: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = cnici1 (orderly), x3 = cnici2 (orderliness property)
cinmo+dukse: excitement: x1 = dukse1 (excess), x2 = cinmo1 (feels [emotion]), x3 = cinmo2 (emotion felt), x4 = cinmo3 (object of emotion), x5 = dukse3 (excess standard)
cinmo+jarco: emotional, (in tanru; remna...) human [emotionally], showing emotions: x1 = jarco1 (show) = cinmo1 (feels [emotion]), x2 = cinmo2 (emotion felt), x3 = jarco3 (shown to)
cinmo+jibni: sympathises, feels close to: x1 = jibni1 (near) = cinmo1 (feels [emotion]), x2 = jibni2 (has near), x3 = jibni3 (nearness property) = cinmo2 (emotion felt)
cinmo+kansa: empathy (in tanru): sympathetic understanding
cinmo+cmavo: attitudinal: x1 = cmavo1 (structure word), x2 = cmavo3 (structure word meaning), x3 = cmavo4 (structure language word)
cnino+jarco: introduce [of concepts]: x1 = jarco1 (show), x2 = jarco2 (shown) = cnino1 (new), x3 = jarco3 (shown to) = cnino2 (find new)
cinmo+rinka: moving [emotionally]: x1 = rinka1 (cause), x2 = cinmo1 (feels [emotion]), x3 = cinmo2 (emotion felt), x4 = cinmo3 (object of emotion), x5 = rinka3 (causation conditions)
cinmo+sepli: heart (figurative), emotional self: x1 = sepli1 (apart) = cinmo1 (feels [emotion]), x2 = sepli2 (separated from)
cinmo+sinxa: sign of emotion: x1 = sinxa1 (sign), x2 = cinmo1 (feels [emotion]), x3 = cinmo2 (emotion felt), x4 = sinxa3 (observe sign)
cinmo+taxfu: sexually provocative clothing, primarily lingerie: x1 = taxfu1 (garment), x2 = taxfu2 (wears garment), x3 = taxfu3 (garment purpose) = cinmo2 (emotion felt)
cortu+badri: painfully sad: x1 = badri1 (someone sad) = cortu1 (pain), x2 = badri2 (depressing)
cortu+tsapi: hot spices: x1 = tsapi1 (seasoning)
cortu+vrusi: painful-tasting [spicy, hot]: x1 = vrusi1 (taste), x2 = vrusi2 (flavored)
cpacu+djica: to want [to get] something: x1 = djica1 (desire) = cpacu1 (get), x2 = cpacu2 (gotten), x3 = cpacu3 (got from), x4 = djica3 (purpose desired for)
se+ke+cpacu+djica what I want [to get]: x1 = cpacu2 (gotten), x2 = djica1 (desire) = cpacu1 (get), x3 = cpacu3 (got from), x4 = djica3 (purpose desired for)
cpadji se cpacu+djica what I want [to get]:
cpacu+tugni: accept [something]: x1 = tugni1 (agree) = cpacu1 (get), x2 = tugni2 (agreed with) = cpacu3 (got from), x3 = cpacu2 (gotten) = tugni4 (agreed about)

cpedu+cusku: to plea, saying: x1 = cusku1 (speaker) = cpedu1 (request), x2 = cusku2 (said), x3 = cusku3 (addressed) = cpedu3 (requested from), x4 = cusku4 (expression medium ), x5 = cpedu2 (requested)
cpina+tsapi: hot spices: x1 = tsapi1 (seasoning)
cipni+zdani: bird's nest: x1 = zdani1 (nest)

lacpu+muvdu+gasnu: pull something: x1 = gasnu1 (do) = lacpu1 (pull), x2 = muvdu1 (moving) = lacpu2 (pulled), x3 = muvdu2 (move destination ), x4 = muvdu3 (move origin ), x5 = muvdu4 (move path), x6 = lacpu3 (pulling locus)
cradi+ve+cradi: radio transmitter/receiver (though velcradi should be adequate): x1 = cradi4 (radio receiver), x2 = cradi2 (radio program), x3 = cradi3 (radio station)
crane+kumfa: anteroom: x1 = kumfa1 (room) = crane1 (front), x2 = kumfa2 (structure with room) = crane2 (has in front), x3 = kumfa3 (room boundary)
crane+lerfu: initial [letter]: x1 = lerfu1 (letteral) = crane1 (front), x2 = crane2 (has in front)
crane+pagbu: front, front portion [body part]: x1 = crane1 (front) = pagbu1 (part), x2 = crane2 (has in front) = pagbu2 (part of), x3 = crane3 (reference for front)
crane+sefta: front surface: x1 = crane1 (front) = sefta1 (surface), x2 = crane2 (has in front) = sefta2 (has surface), x3 = crane3 (reference for front)
crane+stuzi: the front of: x1 = crane1 (front) = stuzi1 (site), x2 = crane2 (has in front), x3 = crane3 (reference for front) (not sure if, x4 = stuzi2 (sited) should be included)
crane+vorme: front door: x1 = vorme1 (door) = crane1 (front), x2 = vorme3 (accessible) = crane2 (has in front), x3 = vorme4 (structure with door) ( x4 = vorme2 (accessible) is the outside)
certu+klesi: character class [of role-playing games]: x1 = klesi1 (class), x2 = certu2 (forte), x3 = certu3 (expertise standard)
crisa+tcika: summer [daylight saving] time: x1 = tcika1 (time of day), x2 = tcika2 (timed at), x3 = tcika3 (day of time), x4 = tcika4 (time location )
cortu+glare: searing heat: x1 = glare1 (hot), x2 = glare2 (hot standard) = cortu1 (pain)
cortu+gletu: sadomasochism: x1 = gletu1 (copulate), x2 = gletu2 (copulated with) = cortu1 (pain) [ x3 = gletu1 (copulate) inflicts pain;, x4 = gletu2 (copulated with) may also inflict pain]
cortu+rinka: to cause pain, to hurt: x1 = rinka1 (cause), x2 = cortu1 (pain), x3 = cortu2 (pain locus), x4 = rinka3 (causation conditions)
curmi+vreji: a permit; (part of tanru for) shares: x1 = vreji1 (record), x2 = curmi1 (let), x3 = curmi2 (allowed), x4 = curmi3 (permission condition), x5 = vreji4
catlu+carna: turn head to look, look around: x1 = carna1 (turn) = catlu1 (looker), x2 = carna2 (turn axis), x3 = carna3 (rotational direction), x4 = catlu2 (examined)
nicte+binxo+temci: twilight: x1 = temci1 (time interval), x2 = nicte2 (day with night), x3 = nicte3 (night location )
nicte+djacu: dew: x1 = djacu1 (water) (other places possible, but they would involve tanru with carvi)
nicte+manku: the dark of the night: x1 = manku1 (dark)
nicte+murse: twilight: x1 = murse1 (twilight), x2 = murse2 (day with twilight), x3 = murse3 (twilight location )
nicte+sanmi: supper: x1 = sanmi1 (meal), x2 = sanmi2 (meal dish)
citka+cinza: chopsticks: x1 = cinza1 (tongs), x2 = cinza2 (use tongs), x3 = cinza3 (grasped with tongs) = citka1 (eat)
citka+cpedu: to order a meal: x1 = cpedu1 (request) = citka1 (eat), x2 = citka2 (eaten), x3 = cpedu3 (requested from), x4 = cpedu4 (request form)
citka+dakfu: knife: x1 = dakfu1 (knife), x2 = dakfu2 (cut by knife) = citka1 (eat), x3 = dakfu3 (knife material)
citka+djica: to have a craving for, to like eating: x1 = djica1 (desire) = citka1 (eat), x2 = citka2 (eaten)
ctidji ka citka+djica: appetite:
ka+citka+djica: appetite: x1 = ka1 ( property abstract), x2 = djica1 (desire) = citka1 (eat), x3 = citka2 (eaten)
citka+gasnu: to feed: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = citka1 (eat), x3 = citka2 (eaten)
citka+kumfa: dining room: x1 = kumfa1 (room), x2 = kumfa2 (structure with room)
ctile+vasru: gas tank, fuel tank: x1 = vasru1 (contain) (omit, x2 = vasru2 (contents) = ctile1 (petroleum))
citka+nelci: glutton, gourmand: x1 = nelci1 (fond), x2 = citka2 (eaten)
citka+platu: dietician: x1 = platu1 (planner), x2 = platu2 (plan made), x3 = citka1 (eat), x4 = citka2 (eaten); [x1 is the dieter, x2 the diet]
citka+pruce: digestion: x1 = pruce1 (process), x2 = pruce2 (input to process) = citka2 (eaten), x3 = pruce3 (process result), x4 = pruce4 (process stage), x5 = citka1 (eat)
citka+pruce+gasnu: to digest: x1 = gasnu1 (do) = citka1 (eat), x2 = pruce2 (input to process) = citka2 (eaten), x3 = pruce3 (process result), x4 = pruce4 (process stage)

citka+salci: [picnic], banquet, feast: x1 = salci1 (celebrate), x2 = salci2 (celebrated), x3 = salci3 (celebration); [the picnic is, x4 = salci3 (celebration)]; ( x5 = salci2 (celebrated) would have to be turned off often, which is a problem either with the lujvo or with salci)
citka+tutci: cutlery: x1 = tutci1 (tool) (as, x2 = tutci2 (done with tool) is obvious)
citka+tutci+lumci: dishwasher: x1 = lumci1 (wash) (omit, x2 = lumci2 (washed) = tutci1 (tool))
xecto+nanca: century: x1 = nanca1 (lasts [in years]), x2 = nanca2 (duration [in years]), x3 = nanca3 (year standard)

ctuca+cukta: textbook: x1 = cukta1 (book), x2 = cukta2 (subject [of book]) = ctuca4 (subject taught), x3 = cukta3 (author [of a book]) = ctuca1 (teacher), x4 = cukta4 (read book) = ctuca2 (person taught), x5 = cukta5 (book medium ), x6 = ctuca3 (teaching), x7 = ctuca5 (teaching method )
ctuca+fasnu: lesson: x1 = fasnu1 (event), x2 = ctuca1 (teacher), x3 = ctuca2 (person taught), x4 = ctuca3 (teaching), x5 = ctuca4 (subject taught), x6 = ctuca5 (teaching method )

ctuca+notci: instructions: x1 = notci1 (message) = ctuca3 (teaching), x2 = notci2 (message subject ) = ctuca4 (subject taught), x3 = notci3 (send message) = ctuca1 (teacher), x4 = notci4 (receive message) = ctuca2 (person taught), x5 = ctuca5 (teaching method )

ctuca+te+tcidu: chrestomathy, learner, textbook: x1 = tcidu3 (read from) = ctuca5 (teaching method ), x2 = tcidu2 (readable) = ctuca3 (teaching), x3 = tcidu1 (read) = ctuca2 (person taught), x4 = ctuca1 (teacher), x5 = ctuca4 (subject taught) (ctucku is much better)

cuxna+se+pagre: filter; passband: x1 = pagre2 (passed through) = cuxna1 (choose), x2 = pagre1 (pass through) = cuxna2 (chosen), x3 = cuxna3 (choices) [x1 filters x2 out of input x3 - a stopband is a {to'e} passband]
cunso+namcu: random number: x1 = namcu1 (number), x2 = cunso3 (probability distribution)
cuntu+zukte: to busy oneself: x1 = zukte1 (act) = cuntu2 (involved in affair), x2 = cuntu1 (affair) = zukte2 (action), x3 = zukte3 (action goal )
cutci+marce: skate, rollerskate, etc.: x1 = cutci1 (shoe) = marce1 (vehicle), x2 = cutci2 (shod) = marce2 (cargo), x3 = marce3 (medium for vehicle), x4 = marce4 (vehicle propulsion)
cutci+trixe: heel of shoe: x1 = trixe1 (behind), x2 = trixe2 (in front) = cutci1 (shoe), x3 = cutci3 (shoe material) [material of heel, not of shoe]
cutci+claxu: barefoot: x1 = claxu1 (alone)
cutci+xe+klama: skate, rolerskate, etc.: x1 = cutci1 (shoe) = klama5 (transportation means ), x2 = cutci2 (shod) = klama1 (come)
cutci+zargu: heel of shoe: x1 = zargu1 (buttock), x2 = zargu2 (has buttock) = cutci1 (shoe), x3 = cutci3 (shoe material)
cutci+nazbi: shoe nose, toe of shoe: x1 = nazbi1 (nose), x2 = nazbi2 (has nose) = cutci1 (shoe), x3 = cutci3 (shoe material) [material of nose, not of shoe]
cukla+maksi+ve+vreji: computer disk/diskette: x1 = cukla1 (round) = vreji4 = maksi1 (magnet), x2 = vreji2 (recorded), x3 = vreji3 (recording medium), x4 = vreji1 (record)
cukla+mulno: completely round: full [of moon, or of any round shape]
cukla+se+barna: spotted [of fish]: x1 = barna2 (marked) = cukla1 (round), x2 = barna2 (marked), x3 = barna3 (mark material)
cukla+tarmi: circle: x1 = tarmi1 (shape) (omit, x2 = tarmi2 (shaped) = ka cukla)
ni+cukla+ganra diameter: x1 = ni1 ( amount abstract), x2 = ni2 ( scale of amount abstract), x3 = ganra1 (broad), x4 = ganra3 (breadth standard)
cukla+gusni+ve+vreji: CD or laser disk: x1 = cukla1 (round) = vreji4 = gusni2 (lit), x2 = vreji2 (recorded), x3 = vreji3 (recording medium), x4 = vreji1 (record)
cumla+cpedu: to beseech, to supplicate, to beg [for some privilege]: x1 = cpedu1 (request) = cumla1 (humble), x2 = cpedu2 (requested), x3 = cpedu3 (requested from), x4 = cpedu4 (request form)
cumki+se+pensi: conceivable: x1 = pensi2 (object of thought), x2 = pensi1 (ponder), x3 = cumki2 (possibility condition)
cumki+munje+cfika: science fiction as exploration of possible worlds: x1 = cfika1 (fiction), x2 = cfika2 (plot), x3 = cfika3 (author [of fiction]), x4 = cumki2 (possibility condition)
cunso+jdini+kelci: lottery, gambling: x1 = kelci1 (play), x2 = kelci2 (plaything) (abbreviation of cunkemdinkei)

cunso+fatri+gasnu: to scatter something among, to distribute something randomly [e.g. cutting cards]: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = fatri1 (distributed), x3 = fatri2 (receive share), x4 = fatri3 (share), x5 = cunso3 (probability distribution)
cunso+penmi: chance acquaintance, to bump into: x1 = penmi1 (encounter), x2 = penmi2 (encountered), x3 = penmi3 (meeting place)
clupa+litru: to travel to somewhere and back again: x1 = litru1 (travel), x2 = litru2 (route traveled), x3 = litru3 (travel means ) [ x4 = litru2 (route traveled) may be just the end (se klama)]
cuxna+tinbe: go along with, agree to action: x1 = cuxna1 (choose) = tinbe1 (obey), x2 = cuxna2 (chosen) = tinbe2 (obeyed), x3 = tinbe3 (commander obeyed), x4 = cuxna3 (choices)
damba+certu: fighting expert: x1 = certu1 (expert) = damba1 (fight), x2 = damba2 (opponent [in fight]), x3 = certu3 (expertise standard)
danre+canlu: space in which a pressure is exerted; force field: x1 = canlu1 (space) = danre2 (pressed), x2 = danre1 (pressure)
damba+jatna: warrior-chief: x1 = jatna1 (captain), x2 = damba1 (fight), x3 = damba2 (opponent [in fight]), x4 = damba3 (in contention)
damba+calku: armor: x1 = calku1 (shell), x2 = calku2 (has shell) = damba1 (fight), x3 = calku3 (shell material)
damba+simsa+fasnu: wargame [as simulation]: x1 = fasnu1 (event) = simsa1 (similar), x2 = simsa2 (resembled by), x3 = simsa3 (similarity property)
damba+casnu: to debate, to argue: x1 = casnu1 (discuss) = damba1 (fight) & damba2 (opponent [in fight]), x2 = casnu2 (discussion subject) = damba3 (in contention)
dandu+gasnu: to hang (tr.): x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = dandu1 (hang), x3 = dandu2 (hung from), x4 = dandu3 (hung by)
dandu+greku: hanging rack: x1 = greku1 (frame) = dandu2 (hung from), x2 = dandu1 (hang)
dadgreku taxfu dandu+greku: clothes rack:
dandu+cnebo+taxfu: necktie: x1 = taxfu1 (garment), x2 = taxfu2 (wears garment), x3 = taxfu3 (garment purpose)

jubme+bolci+kelci: billiards: x1 = kelci1 (play)

lijda+xance+muvdu+gasnu: to move the hand in prayer [e.g. crossing oneself]: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = muvdu2 (move destination ), x3 = muvdu3 (move origin ), x4 = muvdu4 (move path), x5 = lijda1 (religion) (omit, x6 = muvdu1 (moving) = xance1 (hand))

kajde+se+cusku: word of warning, warning: x1 = cusku2 (said), x2 = cusku1 (speaker), x3 = cusku3 (addressed) = kajde2 (warned), x4 = cusku4 (expression medium ), x5 = kajde3 (danger [warned of]) ( x6 = kajde1 (warn) = nu cusku)
jdice+gunka: someone whose job is deciding, e.g. newspaper editors, judges etc.: x1 = gunka1 (worker) = jdice1 (decide), x2 = jdice2 (decision), x3 = jdice3 (matter decided), x4 = gunka3 (work goal )
jdika+rinka: to decrease (tr.): x1 = rinka1 (cause), x2 = jdika1 (decrease), x3 = jdika2 (property decreased), x4 = jdika3 (decrease amount), x5 = rinka3 (causation conditions)

jecta+turni+kamni: governing committee, cabinet: x1 = kamni1 (committee) = turni1 (govern), x2 = turni2 (governed) = jecta1 (polity), x3 = kamni3 (has committee)

jecta+se+xrani+zekri: sabotage, crime against the state: x1 = zekri1 (crime) = xrani1 (injure), x2 = zekri2 (hold as crime), x3 = xrani2 (injured) = jecta1 (polity)
jeftu+fanmo: weekend (culture-dependent; nothing in the word says this is THE end of the week): x1 = fanmo1 (end), x2 = fanmo2 (ended) = jeftu1 (lasts [in weeks])

jbera+pleji: rent: x1 = pleji1 (payor) = jbera1 (borrow), x2 = pleji2 (payment), x3 = pleji3 (payee) = jbera3 (lender), x4 = jbera2 (borrowed), x5 = jbera4 (term [time of a loan])

jetnu+cipra: to test something as being true or false: x1 = cipra1 (test), x2 = cipra2 (property tested [for]) = jetnu1 (true), x3 = cipra3 (tested)

jgena+cnebo+taxfu: bow-tie: x1 = taxfu1 (garment), x2 = taxfu2 (wears garment), x3 = taxfu3 (garment purpose)

jinvi+cusku: to express an opinion: x1 = cusku1 (speaker) = jinvi1 (opine), x2 = jinvi2 (opinion), x3 = jinvi3 (opinion subject ), x4 = cusku3 (addressed), x5 = cusku4 (expression medium ), x6 = jinvi4 (grounds for opinion)
jibri+gunka: employee: x1 = gunka1 (worker) = jibri2 (employed), x2 = gunka2 (task) = jibri1 (job), x3 = gunka3 (work goal ) (but se jibri is sufficient; for employ, cf. te bende)

jinru+lumci: bathes, washes in a bath (tr.): x1 = lumci1 (wash), x2 = lumci2 (washed) = jinru1 (immerse), x3 = lumci3 (removed by washing) = jinru2 (immersed in)

katna+mruli: axe: x1 = mruli1 (hammer), x2 = mruli2 (hammered) = katna2 (be cut), x3 = mruli3 (hammerhead) = katna1 (cutter), x4 = mruli4 (propel hammer)

kurfa+kubli: cube: x1 = kubli1 (polyhedron), x2 = kubli3 (face)
kurfa+mitre: square meter: x1 = mitre1 (meter), x2 = mitre2 (size [in meters]), x3 = mitre3 (meters direction ), x4 = mitre4 (meter standard)
kusru+jatna: opressor: x1 = kusru1 (cruel) = jatna1 (captain), x2 = kusru2 (object of cruelty) = jatna2 (captained)
ku'a+cmima: set intersection: x1 = cmima1 (member), x2 = cmima2 (set of member) = k
lasna+gletu: bondage, B & D [bondage and discipline]: x1 = gletu1 (copulate), x2 = gletu2 (copulated with) = lasna2 (fastened) [ x3 = gletu2 (copulated with) is the submissive partner]
lasna+jgari: to grab, to grip: x1 = jgari1 (grasp) = lasna1 (fasten), x2 = jgari2 (grasped) = lasna3 (fastened to), x3 = jgari3 (grasping appendage), x4 = jgari4 (place grasped)
lakne+rinka: to make something likely: x1 = rinka1 (cause), x2 = lakne1 (probable), x3 = lakne2 (likelihood condition), x4 = rinka3 (causation conditions)
lakne+mleca: less probable: x1 = mleca1 (less) = lakne1 (probable), x2 = mleca2 (undercut), x3 = lakne2 (likelihood condition), x4 = mleca4 (lessness margin)
latmo+natmi: Rome, the Latin nation: x1 = natmi1 (nation)
blabi+pilka+tricu: birch: x1 = tricu1 (tree), x2 = tricu2 (tree species)
blabi+xunre: pink: x1 = blabi1 (white) = xunre1 (red)
lacri+tcica+gasnu: betray: x1 = gasnu1 (do) = lacri2 (trusted), x2 = tcica1 (deceive), x3 = tcica2 (deceived) = lacri1 (rely), x4 = tcica3 (deception subject ) = lacri3 (matter of reliance)
ladru+cange: dairy farm: x1 = cange1 (farm), x2 = cange2 (farm location ), x3 = cange3 (farmer)
ladru+fatri+gasnu: milkman: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = fatri2 (receive share) (omit, x3 = fatri1 (distributed) = ladru1 (milk))
lafti+cpacu: pick up: x1 = cpacu1 (get) = lafti1 (lift), x2 = cpacu2 (gotten) = lafti2 (lifted), x3 = cpacu3 (got from), x4 = lafti3 (lifting locus), x5 = lafti4 (gravity lifted in)

lafti+muvdu+gasnu: to raise, to lift up: x1 = gasnu1 (do) = lafti1 (lift), x2 = muvdu1 (moving) = lafti2 (lifted), x3 = muvdu2 (move destination ), x4 = muvdu3 (move origin ), x5 = lafti3 (lifting locus), x6 = lafti4 (gravity lifted in)
vlagi+nirna+bakfu: clitoris: x1 = bakfu1 (bundle) = vlagi1 (vulva), x2 = vlagi2 (has vulva) = nirna2 (has nerve), x3 = bakfu2 (bundled) = nirna1 (nerve), x4 = bakfu3 (bundle wrapping)
vlagi+ganse+rango: clitoris: x1 = rango1 (organ) = vlagi1 (vulva), x2 = rango2 (has organ) = vlagi2 (has vulva) = ganse1 (perceive)
vlagi+pinji: clitoris: x1 = vlagi1 (vulva) = pinji1 (penis), x2 = vlagi2 (has vulva) = pinji2 (has penis)
vlagi+punli: clitoris: x1 = vlagi1 (vulva) = punli1 (swelling), x2 = punli2 (swollen) = vlagi2 (has vulva) (omit, x3 = punli3 (swelling material))
vlagi+se+kukte+rango: clitoris (possibly slangy?): x1 = rango1 (organ) = vlagi1 (vulva), x2 = rango2 (has organ) = vlagi2 (has vulva) = kukte2 (find delicious)
klani+dunli: equal in quantity: x1 = dunli1 (equal) = klani1 (quantity), x2 = dunli2 (equalled) = klani1 (quantity), x3 = klani3 (scale of quantity)
klani+pajni: to estimate: x1 = pajni1 (judge), x2 = klani1 (quantity), x3 = klani2 (quantifier), x4 = klani3 (scale of quantity)
klaji+trene: tram: x1 = trene1 (train), x2 = trene2 (train car), x3 = trene3 (train system), x4 = trene4
lakse+te+gusni: candle: x1 = lakse1 (wax) = gusni3 (light source), x2 = lakse2 (wax source )
lamji+balvi+djedi: tomorrow: x1 = djedi1 (full day) = balvi1 (future), x2 = lamji2 (has adjacent) = balvi2 (before), x3 = djedi3 (full day standard)
lamji+girzu: block, group adjacent to another: x1 = girzu1 (group) = lamji1 (adjacent), x2 = lamji2 (has adjacent), x3 = lamji3 (adjacency property), x4 = lamji4 (adjacency direction)
lamgri selci lamji+girzu: cell block: x1 = girzu1 (group) = lamji1 (adjacent), x2 = lamji2 (has adjacent), x3 = lamji3 (adjacency property), x4 = lamji4 (adjacency direction)
selci+lamji+girzu: cell block: x1 = girzu1 (group) = lamji1 (adjacent), x2 = lamji2 (has adjacent), x3 = lamji3 (adjacency property), x4 = lamji4 (adjacency direction)
lamji+jeftu: next/previous week: x1 = jeftu1 (lasts [in weeks]) = lamji1 (adjacent), x2 = lamji2 (has adjacent), x3 = jeftu3 (week standard)
lamji+purci: recent, immediately preceding: x1 = lamji1 (adjacent) = purci1 (past), x2 = lamji2 (has adjacent) = purci2 (has in its past), x3 = lamji3 (adjacency property)
lamji+purci+donri: yesterday [daytime]; (more strictly: ) the most recent daytime [yesterday during daytime; this morning at night]
lamji+xabju: next-door neighbour: x1 = xabju1 (dwell) = lamji1 (adjacent), x2 = xabju2 (habitat), x3 = lamji2 (has adjacent), x4 = lamji4 (adjacency direction)
lanli+catlu: to examine something: x1 = lanli1 (analyze) = catlu1 (looker), x2 = lanli2 (analyzed) = catlu2 (examined), x3 = lanli3 (analysis method)
lacpu+minji: tractor: x1 = minji1 (machine) = lacpu1 (pull), x2 = lacpu2 (pulled)
larcu+finti: artist: x1 = finti1 (inventor), x2 = finti2 (creation), x3 = finti3 (invention purpose ), x4 = finti4 (inspiration) = larcu1 (art)
larcu+jarco+stuzi: art museum, gallery: x1 = stuzi1 (site), x2 = jarco2 (shown) = larcu1 (art), x3 = jarco3 (shown to)
larcu+jdice+xamgu: artistic judgement, tastefulness: x1 = xamgu1 (good) = jdice3 (matter decided), x2 = xamgu2 (find good)
larcu+jdice+xlali: bad taste, tasteless: x1 = xlali1 (bad) = jdice3 (matter decided), x2 = xlali2 (find bad)
larcu+kumfa: art chamber [Kunstkammer]: x1 = kumfa1 (room), x2 = kumfa2 (structure with room), x3 = larcu1 (art)
larcu+muzga: gallery: x1 = muzga1 (museum), x2 = muzga2 (exhibited) = larcu1 (art), x3 = muzga3 (museum location )
larcu+cusku: literature, art as expression: x1 = cusku1 (speaker), x2 = cusku2 (said), x3 = cusku3 (addressed), x4 = cusku4 (expression medium ) = larcu2 (craft)
larcu+xamgu: having artistic merit, well-done: x1 = xamgu1 (good), x2 = xamgu2 (find good) (omit, x3 = xamgu3 (goodness standard) = larcu1 (art))
lasna+valsi: conjunction, generic linking word (not necessarily cmavo): x1 = valsi1 (word) = lasna1 (fasten), x2 = lasna2 (fastened), x3 = lasna3 (fastened to), x4 = valsi3 (word language )
slasi+silka: polyester: x1 = slasi1 (plastic) = silka1 (silk), x2 = slasi2 (plastic monomer)

cladu+bacru: to bellow: x1 = bacru1 (speaker) = cladu1 (loud), x2 = bacru2 (utterance), x3 = cladu3 (loudness standard) ( x4 = cladu2 (loud at point) irrelevant); [it is phonater's intent of loudness that matters]
cladu+binxo: to get loud: x1 = cladu1 (loud) = binxo1 (become), x2 = cladu2 (loud at point), x3 = cladu3 (loudness standard)
cladu+ckasu: loudly mock: x1 = ckasu1 (ridicule), x2 = ckasu2 (ridiculed), x3 = ckasu3 (ridiculous), x4 = cladu3 (loudness standard)
cladu+gasnu: to amplify: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = cladu1 (loud), x3 = cladu2 (loud at point), x4 = cladu3 (loudness standard)
cladu+gasnu+cabra: amplifier, microphone: x1 = cabra1 (apparatus), x2 = cabra3 (apparatus operator)
cladu+xajmi: loud joker, loudmouth: x1 = xajmi1 (funny) = cladu1 (loud), x2 = xajmi2 (finds funny), x3 = xajmi3 (funniness property)
cladu+xajmi+prenu: loud joker, loudmouth: x1 = prenu1 (person) = xajmi1 (funny) = cladu1 (loud), x2 = xajmi2 (finds funny), x3 = xajmi3 (funniness property)
cladu+cusku: to shout something: x1 = cusku1 (speaker), x2 = cusku2 (said), x3 = cusku3 (addressed), x4 = cusku4 (expression medium ), x5 = cladu3 (loudness standard)

cladu+zmadu: louder: x1 = zmadu1 (more) = cladu1 (loud), x2 = zmadu2 (exceeded), x3 = cladu2 (loud at point), x4 = zmadu4 (moreness margin) (for elision of, x5 = cladu3 (loudness standard) see bramau)
lanxe+linji: axis of symmetry: x1 = linji1 (line), x2 = linji2 (points on line), x3 = lanxe1 (balance)
lanzu+ckini: relative of...: x1 = ckini1 (related), x2 = ckini2 (related to), x3 = ckini3 (relationship) = lanzu3 (family standard)
lanzu+mintu: relative of...: x1 = mintu1 (same), x2 = mintu2 (has as same), x3 = lanzu3 (family standard)
lanzu+cange: family farm: x1 = cange1 (farm), x2 = cange2 (farm location ), x3 = cange3 (farmer) = lanzu1 (family), x4 = cange4 (farm produce)
lanzu+cmima: member of the family: x1 = cmima1 (member), x2 = cmima2 (set of member) = lanzu1 (family), x3 = lanzu3 (family standard)
lanzu+zdani: family home: x1 = zdani1 (nest), x2 = lanzu2 (family member) = lanzu1 (family)
lebna+djica: to want [to take something from someone]: x1 = djica1 (desire) = lebna1 (take), x2 = lebna2 (aquisition), x3 = lebna3 (taken from), x4 = djica3 (purpose desired for)
lebna+kakne: to be able to take away, can take away: x1 = kakne1 (able) = lebna1 (take), x2 = lebna2 (aquisition), x3 = lebna3 (taken from), x4 = kakne3 (ability conditions)
lebna+valsi: loan word: x1 = valsi1 (word) = lebna2 (aquisition), x2 = valsi2 (word meaning ), x3 = valsi3 (word language ), x4 = lebna3 (taken from) [ = source language]
pleji+bapli: to bribe: x1 = pleji1 (payor), x2 = pleji2 (payment), x3 = pleji3 (payee), x4 = pleji4 (paid for) = bapli2 (forced)
pleji+se+mukti: to bribe: x1 = mukti2 (motivated) = pleji4 (paid for), x2 = mukti1 (motive), x3 = pleji1 (payor) = mukti3 (has motive), x4 = pleji2 (payment), x5 = pleji3 (payee)
lenjo+tutci: eyeglasses: x1 = tutci1 (tool) = lenjo1 (lens), x2 = tutci2 (done with tool)
lebna+rinka: to cause to be taken away: x1 = rinka1 (cause), x2 = lebna1 (take), x3 = lebna2 (aquisition), x4 = lebna3 (taken from), x5 = rinka3 (causation conditions)
lerci+donri: afternoon: x1 = donri1 (daytime) = lerci1 (late), x2 = donri2 (day with daytime), x3 = donri3 (daytime location ), x4 = lerci2 (lateness standard)
lerci+dukse: too late: x1 = lerci1 (late), x2 = dukse3 (excess standard), x3 = lerci2 (lateness standard)
