mledi+grute: mushroom: x1 = grute1 (fruit), x2 = grute2 (fruit species)
klesi+valsi: word describing a group, superordinate: x1 = valsi1 (word), x2 = klesi1 (class), x3 = valsi3 (word language ), x4 = klesi3 (define class)
pleji+pipno: rent: x1 = pipno1 (piano) = pleji1 (payor), x2 = pipno2, x3 = pipno3, x4 = pleji2 (payment), x5 = pleji3 (payee)
lenku+tanxe: icebox: x1 = tanxe1 (box), x2 = tanxe2 (box contents), x3 = tanxe3 (box material)
lerfu+logji: symbolic logic: x1 = logji1 (logic), x2 = logji2 (conclusion)

lerfu+porsi: a string, a sequence of letterals: x1 = porsi1 (sequence), x2 = porsi3 (sequence base set) = lerfu2 (character set) (ordering scheme of the letterals is irrelevant, as it is nonce for each string)
lerfu+se+tcidu: text: x1 = tcidu2 (readable), x2 = tcidu3 (read from), x3 = lerfu2 (character set) ( x4 = tcidu1 (read) is irrelevant to definition)
lerfu+valsi: word denoting a letteral, name of a letter: x1 = valsi1 (word), x2 = valsi2 (word meaning ) = lerfu1 (letteral), x3 = valsi3 (word language )
lidne+bersa: firstborn son: x1 = lidne1 (precede) = bersa1 (son), x2 = bersa2 (parent [of son])
lidne+bruna: eldest brother: x1 = lidne1 (precede) = bruna1 (brother), x2 = lidne2 (preceded) = bruna2 (has brother), x3 = bruna3 (brotherly bond)
lidne+genja: runner [root]: x1 = genja1 (root) = lidne1 (precede), x2 = genja2 (has root), x3 = lidne3 (sequence preceded in)
litru+nelci: fond of travelling: x1 = nelci1 (fond) = litru1 (travel)
litru+tanxe: suitcase: x1 = tanxe1 (box), x2 = tanxe2 (box contents), x3 = tanxe3 (box material)
lindi+brife: lightning breeze, wind during a storm: x1 = brife1 (breeze), x2 = brife2 (wind direction), x3 = brife3 (wind speed)
lindi+savru: thunder: x1 = savru1 (noise), x2 = savru3 (noise channel), x3 = lindi1 (lightning) ( x4 = savru2 (receive noise) is/are irrelevant)
lifri+se+kuspe: range of experience, [lifetime]: x1 = kuspe2 (ranged over), x2 = lifri1 (experience), x3 = lifri2 (happening)
linji+girzu: a row of...: x1 = girzu1 (group) = linji1 (line), x2 = girzu2 (group property ), x3 = linji2 (points on line)
linji+ve+cusku: a line of text: x1 = linji1 (line) = cusku4 (expression medium ), x2 = cusku2 (said), x3 = cusku3 (addressed), x4 = cusku1 (speaker)
linji+se+cnita: underlined: x1 = cnita2 (has underneath), x2 = cnita1 (beneath) = linji1 (line)
linji+stura: a line of...: x1 = stura1 (structure) = linji1 (line), x2 = stura2 (structured)

litki+gasnu: liquify: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = litki1 (liquid), x3 = litki2 (liquid composition), x4 = litki3 (liquidity conditions)
limna+klama: to swim out: x1 = klama1 (come) = limna1 (swim), x2 = klama2 (destination), x3 = klama3 (starting point), x4 = klama4 (route of going), x5 = limna2 (swum in)
limna+vraga: oar: x1 = vraga1 (lever), x2 = vraga2 (function with lever) = limna2 (swum in), x3 = vraga3 (lever fulcrum), x4 = vraga4 (lever arm)
lindi+sance: thunder: x1 = sance1 (sound), x2 = sance2 (emit sound) = lindi1 (lightning)
linsi+grana+xrani: flail: x1 = xrani1 (injure) = grana1 (rod) = linsi1 (chain), x2 = xrani2 (injured), x3 = xrani3 (injury property), x4 = grana2 (rod material), x5 = linsi2 (chain material)
clira+gasnu: hasten, make something early: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = clira1 (early), x3 = clira2 (earliness standard)
clira+zmadu: earlier: x1 = zmadu1 (more), x2 = zmadu2 (exceeded), x3 = zmadu4 (moreness margin) (for elision of, x4 = clira2 (earliness standard), see bramau)
clira+traji: earliest: x1 = clira1 (early) = traji1 (superlative), x2 = traji4 (range limited by extreme) (for elision of, x3 = clira2 (earliness standard), see bramau)
lisri+kumfa: story-room, room in which story is set: x1 = kumfa1 (room), x2 = lisri1 (story)
lisri+nu+troci: attempting/drafting of story: x1 = nu1 ( event abstract), x2 = lisri3 (storyteller) = troci1 (try), x3 = troci2 (attempted) = lisri1 (story), x4 = troci3 (trying method )
lisri+tigni: hero of the story, dramatis personae: x1 = tigni1 (perform), x2 = tigni2 (performance) = lisri1 (story), x3 = tigni3 (performance audience) = lisri4 (hear story)

lisri+cukta: story book: x1 = cukta1 (book), x2 = cukta2 (subject [of book]) = lisri2 (story subject), x3 = cukta3 (author [of a book]) = lisri3 (storyteller), x4 = cukta4 (read book) = lisri4 (hear story), x5 = cukta5 (book medium )
clite+cliva+valsi: "a word of good-bye": x1 = valsi1 (word), x2 = clite1 (polite) = cliva1 (leave), x3 = cliva2 (left behind), x4 = clite3 (politeness standard), x5 = valsi3 (word language )
cliva+bapli: to displace, to expel: x1 = bapli1 (force), x2 = cliva1 (leave), x3 = cliva2 (left behind)
lojbo+pilno: lojbanist: x1 = pilno1 (use), x2 = pilno3 (use purpose )
logji+bangu+girzu: Logical Language Group: x1 = girzu1 (group) = logji1 (logic)
logji+bangu: loglan: x1 = bangu1 (language), x2 = bangu2 (language community), x3 = bangu3
lojbo+tadni: Lojban student: x1 = tadni1 (study)
logji+cipra: logical proof: x1 = cipra1 (test), x2 = cipra2 (property tested [for]), x3 = cipra3 (tested), x4 = logji1 (logic)
logji+tadji: algorithm: x1 = logji1 (logic) = tadji1 (method), x2 = tadji2 (done by method), x3 = tadji3 (method conditions)
loldi+bukpu: carpet (matci): x1 = bukpu1 (cloth), x2 = bukpu2 (cloth material)
loldi+claxu: bottomless: x1 = claxu1 (alone)
loldi+dertu: dirt: x1 = dertu1 (dirt), x2 = dertu2 (dirt source ), x3 = dertu3 (dirt composition), x4 = loldi1 (floor)

loldi+rokci+bolci: cobblestones: x1 = bolci1 (ball) = rokci1 (rock), x2 = rokci2 (rock type ) = bolci2 (ball material), x3 = rokci3 (rock location ), x4 = loldi1 (floor)
bloti+crane: prow: x1 = crane1 (front), x2 = crane2 (has in front) = bloti1 (boat)
lumci+cumki: washable: x1 = lumci1 (wash), x2 = lumci2 (washed), x3 = lumci3 (removed by washing), x4 = cumki2 (possibility condition)
pluja+pluta+dinju: maze: x1 = dinju1 (building), x2 = pluja3 (complexity standard)
lumci+purmo: washing powder: x1 = lumci3 (removed by washing) = purmo1 (powder), x2 = lumci2 (washed)
lumci+vasru: wash-basin: x1 = vasru1 (contain), x2 = vasru2 (contents) = lumci2 (washed)

lunra+bolci: lunar orb: x1 = lunra1 (lunar) = bolci1 (ball)
lunra+cukla: the moon [spoken of as something that can be full or new]: x1 = lunra1 (lunar) = cukla1 (round)
klupe+tutci: screwdriver: x1 = tutci1 (tool), x2 = klupe1 (screw)
pluta+fanmo: dead end: x1 = fanmo1 (end), x2 = fanmo2 (ended) = pluta1 (route)
pluta+kevna: opening [e.g. "There are openings to all sides - (role mlana cu lutke'a")]: x1 = kevna1 (cavity) = pluta3 (route from), x2 = pluta1 (route)
pluta+kumfa: side chamber: x1 = kumfa1 (room), x2 = kumfa2 (structure with room), x3 = pluta1 (route)
kluza+binxo: to loosen: x1 = binxo1 (become) = kluza1 (loose), x2 = kluza2 (has loose covering), x3 = kluza3 (looseness locus )
kluza+certu: blouse [loose shirt]: x1 = certu1 (expert) = kluza1 (loose)
cmana+jbini: valley: x1 = jbini1 (between), x2 = cmana1 (mountain) = jbini2 (have in between), x3 = cmana2 (mountainous)
cmana+fenra: canyon: x1 = fenra1 (crack), x2 = cmana1 (mountain) = fenra2 (cracked), x3 = cmana2 (mountainous)
marce+sazri: to drive a vehicle: x1 = sazri1 (operate), x2 = sazri2 (operated) = marce1 (vehicle), x3 = sazri3 (operating goal)
cmavo+rafsi: rafsi representing cmavo: x1 = rafsi1 (affix), x2 = rafsi3 (affix form), x3 = rafsi4 (affix language ) ( x4 = rafsi2 (has affix) = cmavo1 (structure word))
cmavo+liste: cmavo list: x1 = liste1 (list), x2 = liste3 (order [of a list]), x3 = liste4 (list medium ), x4 = cmavo4 (structure language word)
makcu+clani: old [of living entity]: x1 = clani1 (long) = makcu1 (mature), x2 = clani2 (length direction ) = makcu2 (mature trait), x3 = clani3 (length standard)
manci+rinka: to astonish: x1 = rinka1 (cause), x2 = manci1 (wonder), x3 = manci2 (object of wonder), x4 = rinka3 (causation conditions) (se manci is usually better)
makfa+certu: wizard: x1 = certu1 (expert) = makfa3 (magician), x2 = certu2 (forte) = makfa1 (magic), x3 = certu3 (expertise standard)
makfa+minde: mage: x1 = minde1 (command) = makfa3 (magician), x2 = minde3 (result commanded) = makfa1 (magic), x3 = makfa2 (hold as magical)
marji+pixra: sculpture: x1 = pixra1 (picture) = marji3 (physical form), x2 = pixra2 (depicted), x3 = pixra3 (draw picture), x4 = pixra4 (picture medium) = marji2 (composition)
marji+mintu: of the same material as...: x1 = mintu1 (same) = marji2 (composition), x2 = mintu2 (has as same) = marji2 (composition)
maksi+farna+tutci: compass: x1 = tutci1 (tool), x2 = maksi1 (magnet)
maksi+ve+vreji: magnetic storage: x1 = vreji4 = maksi1 (magnet), x2 = vreji2 (recorded), x3 = vreji3 (recording medium), x4 = vreji1 (record)
mabla+dukse+cinmo: mawkish, sentimental: x1 = cinmo1 (feels [emotion]), x2 = cinmo2 (emotion felt), x3 = cinmo3 (object of emotion), x4 = mabla3 (derogator) = dukse3 (excess standard)

mabla+gletu+troci: try to get into someone's pants, sexually harrass [rape?]: x1 = troci1 (try) = gletu1 (copulate), x2 = gletu2 (copulated with), x3 = troci3 (trying method ), x4 = mabla3 (derogator)

no'e+sinma+tavla: to speak to someone informally [for example, to use the Tu form in a language which has it]: x1 = sinma1 (esteem) = tavla1 (talk), x2 = sinma2 (esteemed) = tavla2 (talked to), x3 = tavla3 (talk subject), x4 = tavla4 (talk language)
no'e+masno+slilu: tenor: x1 = slilu1 (oscillate), x2 = slilu3 (oscillation state)
no'e+sutra+slilu: alto: x1 = slilu1 (oscillate), x2 = slilu3 (oscillation state)
no'e+ralte: don't hold back: x1 = ralte1 (retain), x2 = ralte2 (retained)
notci+creka: T-shirt with a slogan on it: x1 = creka1 (shirt), x2 = creka2 (shirt material), x3 = notci1 (message)
notci+crida: angel, messenger spirit: x1 = crida1 (fairy), x2 = crida2 (fairy mythos), x3 = notci3 (send message), x4 = notci4 (receive message)
snuji+cidja: sandwich as food: x1 = cidja1 (food) = snuji1 (sandwich), x2 = snuji2 (sandwiched), x3 = snuji3 (sandwich outside), x4 = cidja2 (can eat)
nu+balvi+cfika: generic science fiction: x1 = cfika1 (fiction), x2 = cfika2 (plot), x3 = cfika3 (author [of fiction]), x4 = balvi2 (before)
nu+bolci+tikpa+jivna+,+bolci: football ball: x1 = bolci1 (ball), x2 = bolci2 (ball material)

nu+ciste+basti: replacement of a system; inter alia, revolution: x1 = nu1 ( event abstract), x2 = basti1 (substitute) = ciste1 (system), x3 = basti2 (replaced) = ciste1 (system), x4 = basti3 (replacement condition)
nu+clani+plipe: long jump: x1 = nu1 ( event abstract), x2 = clani1 (long), x3 = clani2 (length direction ), x4 = clani3 (length standard), x5 = clani4, x6 = clani5
nu+citka+,+gasnu: to feed (cf. ctigau): x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = citka1 (eat), x3 = citka2 (eaten)
nu+jecta+galfi+bapli: revolution, coup d'etat: x1 = bapli1 (force) = galfi1 (modify), x2 = galfi2 (changed) = jecta1 (polity), x3 = galfi3 (modified into)
nu+jukpa+canlu: space where cooking happens: x1 = canlu1 (space)
nu+kelci+ciste: playing system [of roleplaying games]: x1 = ciste1 (system), x2 = ciste2 (system structure) = nu1 ( event abstract), x3 = ciste3 (system components), x4 = ciste4 (system properties)
nu+pleji+nelci: spendthrift: x1 = nelci1 (fond) = pleji1 (payor), x2 = pleji2 (payment)
nu+makfa+joi+damba: swords and sorcery [of roleplaying games]: x1 = nu1 ( event abstract), x2 = damba1 (fight) = makfa3 (magician)
nu+morsi+pruxi+prenu: Angel of Death, Grim Reaper: x1 = prenu1 (person)
nu+morsi+stuzi: place of death, as opposed to mrostu: x1 = stuzi1 (site), x2 = morsi1 (dead)
nu+penmi+cukta: appointment book, diary: x1 = cukta1 (book), x2 = cukta3 (author [of a book]) = penmi1 (encounter), x3 = cukta5 (book medium )
nu+pensi+rinka: thought-provoking: x1 = rinka1 (cause), x2 = pensi1 (ponder), x3 = pensi2 (object of thought), x4 = rinka3 (causation conditions)
nu+ponse+nelci: greedy, rapacious: x1 = nelci1 (fond) = ponse1 (possess), x2 = ponse2 (possessed)
nu+se+tcica+krici: suspicious [of there being trickery]: x1 = krici1 (believe) = tcica2 (deceived), x2 = tcica1 (deceive) = krici3 (belief subject ), x3 = tcica3 (deception subject )
nu+simxu+tavla: conversation: x1 = nu1 ( event abstract), x2 = tavla1 (talk) & tavla2 (talked to), x3 = tavla3 (talk subject), x4 = tavla4 (talk language)
nu+salci+dansu: ball [dance]: x1 = nu1 ( event abstract), x2 = salci1 (celebrate) = dansu1 (dance), x3 = salci2 (celebrated), x4 = dansu2 (accompaniment [for dance])
nu+sonci+djica: to want to become a soldier (as opposed to soidji): x1 = djica1 (desire), x2 = sonci1 (soldier), x3 = sonci2 (soldier's army), x4 = djica3 (purpose desired for)
nu+solri+canci: sunset: x1 = nu1 ( event abstract), x2 = canci2 (vanished from), x3 = canci3 (see vanish) (omit, x4 = solri1 (solar) = canci1 (vanish))
nu+te+pleji+nelci: greedy: x1 = nelci1 (fond) = pleji3 (payee), x2 = pleji2 (payment)
nu+xukmi+senva: 'trip', drug-induced hallucination: x1 = nu1 ( event abstract), x2 = senva1 (dreamer), x3 = senva2 (dream subject), x4 = xukmi1 (chemical)
nu+zgana+jufra: observative sentence: x1 = jufra1 (sentence), x2 = jufra2 (sentence subject ) = nu1 ( event abstract), x3 = jufra3 (sentence language )

nu+zvati+djuno: to know someone is there, to notice someone, to know someone's whereabouts: x1 = djuno1 (know), x2 = zvati1 (at) = djuno3 (subject known), x3 = zvati2 (location attended), x4 = djuno4 (epistemology)

snura+benji: to archive something: x1 = benji1 (transfer), x2 = benji2 (transferred) = snura1 (secure), x3 = benji3 (receiver), x4 = benji4 (transmitter), x5 = benji5 (medium), x6 = snura2 (secured against)
snura+claxu: treacherous, unsafe: x1 = claxu1 (alone), x2 = snura2 (secured against)
snura+gasnu: protect, safeguard: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = snura1 (secure), x3 = snura2 (secured against)
snura+prenu+claxu: orphaned, deprived of any guardian: x1 = claxu1 (alone)
snura+punji: to stash something: x1 = punji1 (put), x2 = punji2 (placed) = snura1 (secure), x3 = punji3 (placed at), x4 = snura2 (secured against)

nuzba+xagji: hungry [for news]: x1 = xagji1 (hunger)

panzi+speni+rirni: offspring's parent in law, consuegro/a: x1 = rirni1 (parent), x2 = panzi2 (offspring parent) (omit, x3 = rirni2 (raised) = speni1 (married),, x4 = speni2 (married to) = panzi1 (offspring)) (There are many possible elaborations@ tixyspemamta, besyspepa'u, etc.)

pensi+preti: mental question, to ask oneself: x1 = preti1 (question), x2 = preti2 (question subject ) = pensi2 (object of thought), x3 = preti3 (questioner) = preti4 (questioned) = pensi1 (ponder)

pensi+claxu+jinvi: a feeling [intuition]: x1 = jinvi1 (opine) = claxu1 (alone) = pensi1 (ponder), x2 = jinvi2 (opinion), x3 = jinvi3 (opinion subject ) (no, x4 = jinvi4 (grounds for opinion) necessary)
pensi+nu+penmi: seminar: 1, x1 = penmi1 (encounter) = pensi1 (ponder), x2 = penmi2 (encountered) = pensi1 (ponder), x3 = penmi3 (meeting place), x4 = pensi2 (object of thought)
pensi+se+raktu: troubled by thoughts: x1 = raktu2 (troubled) = pensi1 (ponder), x2 = raktu1 (trouble) = pensi2 (object of thought), x3 = raktu3 (troubling result)

pendo+traji: to make feel welcome, to be as nice as can be to; to be someone's best friend: x1 = traji1 (superlative) = pendo1 (friend), x2 = traji4 (range limited by extreme), x3 = pendo2 (befriended)

penmi+sidju+xatra: letter of introduction: x1 = xatra1 (letter) = sidju1 (help) = penmi1 (encounter), x2 = xatra2 (letter addressee) = penmi2 (encountered), x3 = xatra3 (letter author), x4 = sidju2 (helped)

polje+pijne+tutci: stapler: x1 = tutci1 (tool)
spoja+farlu: fall to pieces [of house]: x1 = spoja1 (explode) = farlu1 (fall), x2 = farlu2 (fallen to), x3 = spoja2 (explosion result)
spoja+daspo: to blow something up: x1 = daspo1 (destroy), x2 = daspo2 (ruined) = spoja1 (explode), x3 = spoja2 (explosion result)

porsi+jalge+liste: the result of ordering something, a sorted list: x1 = liste1 (list) = porsi1 (sequence), x2 = liste2 (set listed) = porsi2 (ordering rule), x3 = liste3 (order [of a list]) = porsi3 (sequence base set), x4 = liste4 (list medium )
spoja+cmana: volcano: x1 = spoja1 (explode) = cmana1 (mountain), x2 = cmana2 (mountainous)
spoja+rinka: blasting [with dynamite]: x1 = rinka1 (cause), x2 = spoja1 (explode), x3 = spoja2 (explosion result), x4 = rinka3 (causation conditions)
porpi+rinka: to shatter (tr.): x1 = rinka1 (cause), x2 = porpi1 (break), x3 = porpi2 (broken piece), x4 = rinka3 (causation conditions)
porpi+se+gusni: illuminated by slashes/strips/flecks of light: x1 = gusni2 (lit), x2 = gusni1 (light), x3 = gusni3 (light source)
porpi+gasnu: to break (tr.): x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = porpi1 (break), x3 = porpi2 (broken piece)
porsi+jmina: to append (tr.): x1 = jmina1 (add), x2 = jmina2 (additive), x3 = jmina3 (added to), x4 = jmina4 (addition result)

porsi+lamji: successive [e.g. "two successive Olympic games"]: x1 = lamji1 (adjacent), x2 = lamji2 (has adjacent), x3 = porsi2 (ordering rule) = lamji3 (adjacency property), x4 = lamji4 (adjacency direction)
porsi+se+fatri: taking turns: x1 = fatri2 (receive share) = porsi1 (sequence), x2 = fatri1 (distributed), x3 = porsi2 (ordering rule), x4 = porsi3 (sequence base set)
porsi+ve+jmina: the result of appending something to something: x1 = jmina4 (addition result), x2 = jmina2 (additive), x3 = jmina3 (added to), x4 = porsi2 (ordering rule)
ponse+nelci: greedy, rapacious: x1 = nelci1 (fond) = ponse1 (possess), x2 = ponse2 (possessed)
ponse+rinka: make someone an owner of something: x1 = rinka1 (cause), x2 = ponse1 (possess), x3 = ponse2 (possessed), x4 = ponse3 (possession right), x5 = rinka3 (causation conditions)
ponse+djica: to want to have something: x1 = djica1 (desire) = ponse1 (possess), x2 = ponse2 (possessed), x3 = djica3 (purpose desired for) ( x4 = ponse3 (possession right) irrelevant)
prenu+claxu: deserted [place]: x1 = claxu1 (alone)
prenu+girzu: group of people: x1 = girzu1 (group), x2 = girzu2 (group property ) = prenu1 (person)
prenu+tarmi: figure [as in "a shadowy figure approaches"]: x1 = tarmi1 (shape), x2 = tarmi2 (shaped) = prenu1 (person)
prenu+jitro+cange: family farm: x1 = cange1 (farm) = jitro2 (controlled), x2 = cange2 (farm location ), x3 = cange3 (farmer) = jitro1 (control) = prenu1 (person), x4 = cange4 (farm produce)
preti+pensi: mental question, to ask oneself: x1 = preti1 (question), x2 = preti2 (question subject ) = pensi2 (object of thought), x3 = preti3 (questioner) = preti4 (questioned) = pensi1 (ponder)
ve+prenu+ve+marce: human-powered vehicle [e.g. bicycle, rickshaw]: x1 = marce1 (vehicle), x2 = marce2 (cargo), x3 = marce3 (medium for vehicle), x4 = prenu1 (person) = marce4 (vehicle propulsion)
prenu+zdani: house: x1 = zdani1 (nest), x2 = prenu1 (person) = zdani1 (nest)
prina+prenu: printer: x1 = prenu1 (person), x2 = prina1 (print)
pritu+xance: right hand: x1 = xance1 (hand) = pritu1 (right), x2 = xance2 (has hand)
fapro+lanxe: uneven [of combat, fight]: x1 = lanxe1 (balance)
lisri purci+cedra lisri: old saga:
purci+cedra lisri: old saga: x1 = lisri1 (story), x2 = lisri2 (story subject) = cedra2 (characterize era), x3 = lisri3 (storyteller), x4 = lisri4 (hear story)
purci+cedra: historical: x1 = purci1 (past) = cedra1 (era), x2 = cedra2 (characterize era), x3 = purci2 (has in its past)
purci+cilmo+rinka: to previously moisten, to premoisten: x1 = rinka1 (cause), x2 = cilmo1 (moist), x3 = cilmo2 (moisture), x4 = rinka3 (causation conditions), x5 = purci2 (has in its past)
purci+jeftu: a previous week: x1 = jeftu1 (lasts [in weeks]) = purci1 (past), x2 = purci2 (has in its past), x3 = jeftu3 (week standard)

purci+lamji+jeftu: the immediately previous week, last week, the preceding week: x1 = jeftu1 (lasts [in weeks]) = purci1 (past) = lamji1 (adjacent), x2 = purci2 (has in its past) = lamji2 (has adjacent), x3 = jeftu3 (week standard)
purci+lamji: recent, immediately preceding, last, the preceding: x1 = lamji1 (adjacent) = purci1 (past), x2 = lamji2 (has adjacent) = purci2 (has in its past), x3 = lamji3 (adjacency property)

purci+lamji+nicte: last night, the immediately preceding night [nighttime], the night [nighttime] before (cf. prulamvanci): x1 = nicte1 (night) = lamji1 (adjacent) = purci1 (past), x2 = purci2 (has in its past) = lamji2 (has adjacent), x3 = nicte3 (night location )

purci+lamji+vanci: last evening, the immediately preceding night, the night before: x1 = vanci1 (evening) = lamji1 (adjacent) = purci1 (past), x2 = purci2 (has in its past) = lamji2 (has adjacent), x3 = vanci3 (evening location)

balvi+lamji+vanci: the next evening, the immediately following evening, this evening/tomorrow evening (depending on current time of day): x1 = vanci1 (evening) = lamji1 (adjacent) = balvi1 (future), x2 = balvi2 (before) = lamji2 (has adjacent), x3 = vanci3 (evening location)
purci+sruma: to presuppose: x1 = sruma1 (assume), x2 = sruma2 (assumed), x3 = sruma3 (assumption subject), x4 = purci2 (has in its past)
se+purci+sruma: an assumption, a preconception: x1 = sruma2 (assumed), x2 = sruma1 (assume), x3 = sruma3 (assumption subject), x4 = purci2 (has in its past)
purci+se+pilno: used, second-hand: x1 = pilno2 (used), x2 = pilno1 (use) = purci1 (past), x3 = pilno3 (use purpose )
purci+se+ponse: pre-owned, second-hand: x1 = ponse2 (possessed), x2 = ponse1 (possess), x3 = ponse3 (possession right), x4 = purci2 (has in its past)
purci+sonci: a veteran: x1 = sonci1 (soldier), x2 = sonci2 (soldier's army)
pruxi+crida: spirit: x1 = crida1 (fairy) = pruxi1 (spirit), x2 = crida2 (fairy mythos)
purci+lamji+djedi: yesterday, the immediately preceding day, the previous day: x1 = djedi1 (full day), x2 = lamji2 (has adjacent), x3 = djedi3 (full day standard)

purci+lamji+traji: the latest: x1 = traji1 (superlative) = lamji1 (adjacent) = purci1 (past), x2 = traji4 (range limited by extreme), x3 = lamji2 (has adjacent) = purci2 (has in its past) [recent relative to, x4 = purci2 (has in its past)]
purci+platu: to fore-plan, to intend, on purpose: x1 = platu1 (planner), x2 = platu2 (plan made), x3 = platu3 (planned out), x4 = purci2 (has in its past)
purci+softo: former USSR, CIS: x1 = purci1 (past) = softo1 (Soviet), x2 = softo2 (Soviet aspect)
srana+temci: due time: x1 = srana1 (pertain) = temci1 (time interval), x2 = temci2 (start time), x3 = temci3 (end time), x4 = srana2 (pertained to) (not a very good tanru)
ralte+tutci: tool for holding things [including brooches, wrenches, pliers]: x1 = tutci1 (tool) = ralte1 (retain), x2 = ralte2 (retained)
ranji+tavla: to rattle on: x1 = tavla1 (talk), x2 = tavla2 (talked to), x3 = tavla3 (talk subject), x4 = tavla4 (talk language), x5 = ranji2 (continuity interval)
raktu+badri: bitter [of emotion]: x1 = raktu2 (troubled) = badri1 (someone sad), x2 = raktu1 (trouble) = badri2 (depressing)
raktu+claxu: blissfully unaware, unperturbed, untroubled: x1 = claxu1 (alone) = raktu2 (troubled), x2 = raktu1 (trouble)
ralci+zmadu: more delicate: x1 = zmadu1 (more), x2 = zmadu2 (exceeded), x3 = ralci2 (delicacy property), x4 = zmadu4 (moreness margin)
traji+gugde: superpower: x1 = gugde1 (country) = traji1 (superlative), x2 = gugde2 (countrymen), x3 = gugde3 (territory of country), x4 = traji2 (superlative property)
traji+nanmu: hero: x1 = nanmu1 (man) = traji1 (superlative), x2 = traji2 (superlative property), x3 = traji4 (range limited by extreme)
sraji+cmana: cliff: x1 = sraji1 (vertical) = cmana1 (mountain), x2 = cmana2 (mountainous)
sraji+clani: tall: x1 = clani1 (long), x2 = clani3 (length standard), x3 = sraji2 (frame for verticality)

sraji+clani+zmadu: taller [of stature]: x1 = zmadu1 (more), x2 = zmadu2 (exceeded), x3 = sraji2 (frame for verticality), x4 = zmadu4 (moreness margin) (for elision of, x5 = clani3 (length standard) see bramau)
sraji+flani: recorder [flute]: x1 = flani1 (flute) = sraji1 (vertical)
sraji+kevna: a pit: x1 = kevna1 (cavity) = sraji1 (vertical), x2 = kevna2 (has cavity), x3 = sraji2 (frame for verticality)
sraji+kevna+loldi: floor of pit: x1 = loldi1 (floor), x2 = kevna1 (cavity) = loldi2 (has floor)
sraji+mudri: stake: x1 = mudri1 (wood) = sraji1 (vertical), x2 = mudri2 (wood species)
sraji+sirji+drani: straight [as in "sit up straight"]: x1 = drani1 (correct) = sirji1 (straight) = sraji1 (vertical), x2 = drani3 (correctness situation), x3 = drani4 (correctness standard)
sraji+tonga+girzu: chord: x1 = girzu1 (group) = sraji1 (vertical), x2 = girzu2 (group property ) = tonga1 (tone), x3 = girzu3 (membership), x4 = girzu4 (roles)
sraji+tubnu: vertical tunnel/tube [e.g. manhole]: x1 = tubnu1 (tube) = sraji1 (vertical), x2 = tubnu2 (tube material), x3 = tubnu3 (tube filling), x4 = sraji2 (frame for verticality)
ralju+gasnu: to point out as principal; to put in charge: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = ralju1 (principal), x3 = ralju2 (has as principal), x4 = ralju3 (primacy property)

ralju+se+vamji: most valuable, critical: x1 = ralju1 (principal) = vamji2 (valued), x2 = vamji1 (value), x3 = vamji3 (valued by), x4 = vamji4 (valued for) = ralju3 (primacy property), x5 = ralju2 (has as principal) ( x6 = vamji1 (value) can usually be elided out)
ralju+tcadu: capital: x1 = ralju1 (principal) = tcadu1 (city), x2 = tcadu3 (polity with city) = ralju2 (has as principal)
ranti+bongu: cartilage, gristle: x1 = ranti1 (soft) = bongu1 (bone), x2 = bongu2 (bone function )
ranti+cilmo+dertu: moor: x1 = dertu1 (dirt), x2 = dertu2 (dirt source ), x3 = dertu3 (dirt composition)
ranti+cilmo+dertu+kevna: bog: x1 = kevna1 (cavity), x2 = dertu2 (dirt source ), x3 = dertu3 (dirt composition)
ranti+cindu: soft oak: x1 = ranti1 (soft) = cindu1 (oak), x2 = cindu2 (oak species)
rapli+ciksi: to keep explaining: x1 = ciksi1 (explain), x2 = ciksi2 (explained), x3 = ciksi3 (get explanation), x4 = ciksi4 (explanation), x5 = rapli2 (repeat count)
rapli+te+preti: keep asking: x1 = preti3 (questioner), x2 = preti2 (question subject ), x3 = preti1 (question), x4 = preti4 (questioned), x5 = rapli2 (repeat count)
rapli+darxi: to beat (tr.): x1 = darxi1 (hit), x2 = darxi2 (struck), x3 = darxi3 (hitting tool), x4 = darxi4 (hit locus ), x5 = rapli2 (repeat count)
rarna+bangu: natural language: x1 = rarna1 (natural) = bangu1 (language), x2 = bangu2 (language community), x3 = bangu3
rarna+gerna: natural grammar: x1 = rarna1 (natural) = gerna1 (grammar), x2 = gerna2 (grammar language ), x3 = gerna3 (grammatical)
rarna+javni: law of nature, law of physics: x1 = rarna1 (natural) = javni1 (rule), x2 = javni2 (prescribed by rule) (omit, x3 = javni3 (has rule) = le ca'a munje)
rarna+lanli+saske: physics: x1 = saske1 (science), x2 = saske2 (science subject ), x3 = saske3 (science methodology) [ x4 = saske2 (science subject ) = kind of physics]
rarna+minde: druid, wizard: x1 = minde1 (command), x2 = minde3 (result commanded) = rarna1 (natural)
rarna+saske: natural science, physics: x1 = saske1 (science), x2 = saske2 (science subject ), x3 = saske3 (science methodology)
rarna+tapla: naturally occuring tile/cake: x1 = rarna1 (natural) = tapla1 (tile), x2 = tapla2 (tile material), x3 = tapla3, x4 = tapla4
rarna+vanbi: habitat: x1 = vanbi1 (environment) = rarna1 (natural), x2 = vanbi2 (has environment)
grasu+te+gusni: lantern: x1 = gusni3 (light source), x2 = grasu1 (grease)
grasu+se+pilka: greased, anointed: x1 = pilka2 (has crust)
ratni+midju: nucleus: x1 = midju1 (middle), x2 = midju2 (has at middle) = ratni1 (atom)
ratni+saske: [nuclear] physics: x1 = saske1 (science), x2 = saske3 (science methodology)
ratni+sruri: electron: x1 = sruri1 (surround), x2 = sruri2 (surrounded) = ratni1 (atom), x3 = sruri3 (direction surrounded) [ = electron shell]
ragve+catlu: look through: x1 = catlu1 (looker) = ragve3 (across from), x2 = catlu2 (examined) = ragve1 (across), x3 = ragve2 (gap) [look at x2 through x3]
ragve+plipe: to leap across: x1 = plipe1 (leap), x2 = ragve2 (gap), x3 = plipe3 (leaped from), x4 = plipe4 (leap height), x5 = plipe5 (propulsion for leap)
remna+zdani: house: x1 = zdani1 (nest)
renro+jivna: to compete in the discus: x1 = jivna1 (compete) = renro1 (throw), x2 = jivna2 (rival) = renro1 (throw), x3 = jivna4 (prize)
rectu+jukpa+carna+cabra: A spit [as in cooking meat]: x1 = cabra1 (apparatus), x2 = cabra3 (apparatus operator)
bredi+gasnu: to prepare, to ready: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = bredi1 (ready), x3 = bredi2 (event prepared for)
krefu+sipna: go back to sleep: x1 = sipna1 (sleep), x2 = krefu3 (number of recurrence)
krefu+cusku: recapitulation: x1 = cusku1 (speaker), x2 = cusku2 (said), x3 = cusku3 (addressed), x4 = cusku4 (expression medium ), x5 = krefu3 (number of recurrence)
krefu+facki: to rediscover: x1 = facki1 (discover), x2 = facki2 (discovery), x3 = facki3 (subject discovered), x4 = krefu3 (number of recurrence)
vreji+gasnu: to record something: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = vreji1 (record), x3 = vreji2 (recorded), x4 = vreji3 (recording medium), x5 = vreji4
vreji+selfu: secretary of...: x1 = selfu1 (serve), x2 = selfu2 (served)
vreji+se+jibri: secretary of...: x1 = jibri2 (employed)
greku+bongu: spine, emphasizing frame support aspect: x1 = bongu1 (bone) = greku1 (frame), x2 = bongu2 (bone function )
re+balre+katna: scissors: x1 = katna1 (cutter) = balre2 (bladed)
re+cimde+namcu: complex number: x1 = namcu1 (number)
re+cinse+gletu+prenu: bisexual: x1 = prenu1 (person)
re+cinse+prami+prenu: bisexual: x1 = prenu1 (person)
re+nicte: Tuesday night [nighttime]: x1 = nicte1 (night), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = nicte3 (night location )
pa+nicte: Monday night [nighttime]: x1 = nicte1 (night), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = nicte3 (night location )
ci+nicte: Wednesday night [nighttime]: x1 = nicte1 (night), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = nicte3 (night location )
vo+nicte: Thurday night [nighttime]: x1 = nicte1 (night), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = nicte3 (night location )
re+nicte: Friday night [nighttime]: x1 = nicte1 (night), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = nicte3 (night location )
re+nicte: Saturday night [nighttime]: x1 = nicte1 (night), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = nicte3 (night location )
no+nicte: Sunday night [nighttime]: x1 = nicte1 (night), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = nicte3 (night location )
ze+nicte: Sunday night [nighttime]: x1 = nicte1 (night), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = nicte3 (night location )
re+donri: Tuesday daytime: x1 = donri1 (daytime), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = donri3 (daytime location )
pa+donri: Monday daytime: x1 = donri1 (daytime), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = donri3 (daytime location )
ci+donri: Wednesday daytime: x1 = donri1 (daytime), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = donri3 (daytime location )
vo+donri: Thurday daytime: x1 = donri1 (daytime), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = donri3 (daytime location )
re+donri: Friday daytime: x1 = donri1 (daytime), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = donri3 (daytime location )
re+donri: Saturday daytime: x1 = donri1 (daytime), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = donri3 (daytime location )
no+donri: Sunday daytime: x1 = donri1 (daytime), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = donri3 (daytime location )
ze+donri: Sunday daytime: x1 = donri1 (daytime), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = donri3 (daytime location )
re+vanbi: Tuesday evening: x1 = vanbi1 (environment), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = vanbi3
pa+vanbi: Monday evening: x1 = vanbi1 (environment), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = vanbi3
ci+vanbi: Wednesday evening: x1 = vanbi1 (environment), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = vanbi3
vo+vanbi: Thurday evening: x1 = vanbi1 (environment), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = vanbi3
re+vanbi: Friday evening: x1 = vanbi1 (environment), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = vanbi3
re+vanbi: Saturday evening: x1 = vanbi1 (environment), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = vanbi3
no+vanbi: Sunday evening: x1 = vanbi1 (environment), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = vanbi3
ze+vanbi: Sunday evening: x1 = vanbi1 (environment), x2 = djedi3 (full day standard) (by analogy with cibdei), x3 = vanbi3
re+pilji: double: x1 = pilji1 (product), x2 = pilji2 (multiplicand)
ve+re+prenu+ve+marce: tandem bicycle: x1 = prenu1 (person) = marce4 (vehicle propulsion), x2 = marce2 (cargo), x3 = marce3 (medium for vehicle), x4 = marce1 (vehicle)
re+purci: second-last [in time]: x1 = purci1 (past), x2 = purci2 (has in its past)
re+purci+darxi: with two upbeats, drag stroke: x1 = ckaji1 (is characterized)
re+se+balre: scissors: x1 = balre2 (bladed), x2 = balre1 (blade)
re+se+calku: bivalves [animals]: x1 = calku2 (has shell)
re+se+jimca: two-branched; binary [of trees as data structures]: x1 = jimca2 (branched)
re+se+mlana: two-sided [mirror]: x1 = mlana2 (has to the side)
re+se+xislu: two-wheeled: x1 = xislu2 (wheeled vehicle), x2 = xislu3 (wheel properties)
re+skori+satre: double stop in string instruments: x1 = satre1 (stroke), x2 = satre2 (stroked) = skori1 (cord), x3 = satre3 (stroked with)
re+te+gradu: secondary [e.g. second cousins]: x1 = gradu3 (measured by unit), x2 = gradu2 (unit standard) (cf. cibyteryrau)
re+xagri: double reed: x1 = xagri1 (reed instrument), x2 = xagri2 (reed) = r
re+xislu+marce: bicycle, motorbike: x1 = marce1 (vehicle), x2 = marce2 (cargo), x3 = marce3 (medium for vehicle), x4 = marce4 (vehicle propulsion)
remna+bangu: human language: x1 = bangu1 (language), x2 = bangu2 (language community), x3 = bangu3
remna+binxo: to be incarnated: x1 = binxo1 (become) = remna1 (human)
remna+cidja: food for humans: x1 = cidja1 (food)
remna+girzu: group of people: x1 = girzu1 (group), x2 = girzu2 (group property ) = remna1 (human)
remna+skari: colour of human skin [ref. to "race"]: x1 = skari1 (colored)
remna+skapi: [human] skin: x1 = skapi1 (pelt)
remna+sovda: human ovum: x1 = sovda1 (egg), x2 = sovda2 (ovulate) = remna1 (human)
remna+tarmi: human-like [in shape]; a figure: x1 = tarmi1 (shape)
remna+tsiju: human sperm: x1 = tsiju1 (seed), x2 = tsiju2 (organism with seed) = remna1 (human)
remna+makcu+temci: generation: x1 = temci1 (time interval), x2 = temci2 (start time), x3 = temci3 (end time)
trene+klama: to go by train: x1 = klama1 (come), x2 = klama2 (destination), x3 = klama3 (starting point), x4 = klama4 (route of going), x5 = trene1 (train), x6 = trene3 (train system)
renro+cecla: slingshot: x1 = cecla1 (launcher), x2 = cecla2 (projectile), x3 = cecla3 (propellant)
respa+crida: dragon: x1 = crida1 (fairy), x2 = crida2 (fairy mythos)

preti+cusku: to ask a question: x1 = cusku1 (speaker) = preti3 (questioner), x2 = cusku2 (said) = preti1 (question), x3 = cusku3 (addressed) = preti4 (questioned), x4 = cusku4 (expression medium ), x5 = preti2 (question subject )
preti+spuda: to answer a question: x1 = spuda1 (respond) = preti3 (questioner), x2 = spuda2 (stimulus) = preti4 (questioned), x3 = spuda3 (response) = preti1 (question)

preti+sisku: to run a poll; more generally, to seek a truth through questions: x1 = sisku1 (seek) = preti3 (questioner), x2 = sisku2 (property sought) = preti2 (question subject ), x3 = sisku3 (set sought in) = preti4 (questioned)
renvi+clani: old, having been through a lot, enduring, ancient: x1 = renvi1 (survivor), x2 = renvi2 (endured), x3 = clani3 (length standard) (omit, x4 = clani1 (long) = renvi3 (survival time))

sutra+citka+cidja: fast food [to eat]: x1 = cidja1 (food), x2 = cidja2 (can eat)
sutra+fasnu: fly by [e.g. "Blur in brain"]; more generally, a flash [of an event]: x1 = fasnu1 (event) = sutra2 (done fast)
sutra+flecu: rush in [of liquid]: x1 = flecu1 (flow) = sutra1 (fast), x2 = flecu2 (has flow), x3 = flecu3 (flow destination ), x4 = flecu4 (flow source )

sutra+ke+jukpa+sabji+cidja: fast food [quick to prepare and eat]: x1 = cidja1 (food) = sabji2 (provisions) = jukpa2 (cooked), x2 = cidja2 (can eat) = sabji3 (provided with), x3 = sabji1 (provide) = jukpa1 (cook), x4 = jukpa3 (recipe)
sutra+traji: fastest: x1 = sutra1 (fast) = traji1 (superlative), x2 = traji4 (range limited by extreme), x3 = sutra2 (done fast)
sutra+traji+slilu: sopranino: x1 = slilu1 (oscillate), x2 = slilu3 (oscillation state), x3 = traji4 (range limited by extreme)
sutra+bapli: to rush someone: x1 = bapli1 (force), x2 = sutra1 (fast), x3 = sutra2 (done fast)
sutra+finti: to come up with on the fly/spot, to cook something up: x1 = finti1 (inventor) = sutra1 (fast), x2 = finti2 (creation), x3 = finti3 (invention purpose ), x4 = finti4 (inspiration)
sutra+gasnu: to rush someone: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = sutra1 (fast), x3 = sutra2 (done fast)
sutra+jivna: race [speed]: x1 = jivna1 (compete), x2 = jivna2 (rival), x3 = jivna3 (contest) = sutra2 (done fast), x4 = jivna4 (prize)
sutra+klama: to go quickly: x1 = klama1 (come) = sutra1 (fast), x2 = klama2 (destination), x3 = klama3 (starting point), x4 = klama4 (route of going), x5 = klama5 (transportation means )

sutra+sabji+cidja: fast food (canonical term): x1 = cidja1 (food) = sabji2 (provisions), x2 = cidja2 (can eat) = sabji3 (provided with), x3 = sabji1 (provide)
sutra+spuda: to reply fast: x1 = spuda1 (respond) = sutra1 (fast), x2 = spuda2 (stimulus), x3 = spuda3 (response)
sutra+jukpa+cidja: microwaveable food (not "fast food", cf. sutryzbadja): x1 = cidja1 (food) = jukpa2 (cooked), x2 = cidja2 (can eat), x3 = jukpa3 (recipe)
tavla+jimpe: understand someone talking: x1 = jimpe1 (understand), x2 = jimpe3 (subject understood) = tavla1 (talk)
tavla+tutci: anthropophonic apparatus: x1 = tutci1 (tool)

tavla+xlura: to talk someone into something, to persuade: x1 = xlura1 (influence) = tavla1 (talk), x2 = xlura2 (influenced) = tavla2 (talked to), x3 = xlura3 (influenced action), x4 = tavla3 (talk subject)

tanbo+darxi: striking a board; snap [of pizzicato]: x1 = darxi1 (hit), x2 = darxi2 (struck) = tanbo1 (board), x3 = darxi3 (hitting tool), x4 = darxi4 (hit locus )

tagji+zmadu: tighter: x1 = zmadu1 (more), x2 = zmadu2 (exceeded), x3 = tagji2 (has snugly), x4 = tagji3 (snugness dimension), x5 = tagji4 (snugness locus ), x6 = zmadu4 (moreness margin)

staku+tapla: ceramic tile: x1 = tapla1 (tile) = staku1 (ceramic), x2 = tapla2 (tile material) = staku3 (ceramic composition), x3 = tapla3 = staku4 (ceramic form), x4 = tapla4

staku+bliku: brick: x1 = staku1 (ceramic) = bliku1 (block), x2 = bliku2 (block material) = staku3 (ceramic composition), x3 = bliku3 (block surface) = staku4 (ceramic form), x4 = staku2 (make ceramic)

tanko+tcaci+pilno: to have a smoking habit: x1 = pilno1 (use) = tcaci2 (acccustomed), x2 = pilno2 (used) = tanko1 (tobacco), x3 = pilno3 (use purpose ), x4 = tcaci3 (custom conditions)
tanko+danmo: tobacco smoke: x1 = danmo1 (smoke), x2 = danmo2 (smoke source) = tanko2 (tobacco species)

tanko+jelca+gasnu: to smoke something: x1 = gasnu1 (do), x2 = tanko1 (tobacco) = jelca1 (burn), x3 = jelca2 (combustion temperature), x4 = jelca3 (burning atmosphere)

stapa+klama: to step to something: x1 = stapa1 (step) = klama1 (come), x2 = klama2 (destination), x3 = klama3 (starting point), x4 = klama4 (route of going), x5 = klama5 (transportation means ) = stapa3 (stepping limb), x6 = stapa2 (surface stepped on)

tcica+jitfa+cusku: lie: x1 = cusku1 (speaker), x2 = cusku2 (said) = tcica1 (deceive) = jitfa1 (false), x3 = cusku3 (addressed) = tcica2 (deceived), x4 = cusku4 (expression medium ), x5 = jitfa2 (falsity standard), x6 = tcica3 (deception subject )

tcica+cusku: to equivocate, to deceive someone in saying something [includes lies and half-truths]: x1 = cusku1 (speaker), x2 = cusku2 (said) = tcica1 (deceive), x3 = cusku3 (addressed) = tcica2 (deceived), x4 = cusku4 (expression medium ), x5 = tcica3 (deception subject )
tigni+dinju: theatre: x1 = dinju1 (building), x2 = dinju2 (building purpose ) = tigni2 (performance)

to'e+cumki: impossible: x1 = cumki1 (possible), x2 = cumki2 (possibility condition)
to'e+darsi: coward, shirker: x1 = darsi1 (dare), x2 = darsi2 (audacious behavior)

tordu+zmadu: shorter: x1 = zmadu1 (more) = tordu1 (short), x2 = zmadu2 (exceeded), x3 = tordu2 (shortness dimension), x4 = zmadu4 (moreness margin) (for elision of, x5 = tordu3 (shortness standard) see bramau)
